value.name: Hunted!
value.info_text:
You are hunted!.

There is a 1% chance each turn that all foes in a 10 radius get a glimpse of your position for 30 turns.

value.name: Teleport: Angolwen
value.info_text:
Allows a mage to teleport to the secret town of Angolwen.

You have studied the magic arts there and have been granted a special portal spell to teleport there.

Nobody must learn about this spell and so it should never be used while seen by any creatures.

The spell will take time to activate. You must be out of sight of any creature when you cast it and when the teleportation takes effect.

The spell will take time to activate. You must be out of sight of any creature when you cast it and when the teleportation takes effect.

The spell will take time to activate. You must be out of sight of any creature when you cast it and when the timeportation takes effect.

value.name: Weapon of Light
value.info_text:
Infuse your weapon with the power of the Sun, adding 23, 44, 60, 73, 85 light damage on each melee hit.

Additionally, if you have a temporary damage shield active, melee attacks will increase its power by 11, 21, 29, 36, 42.

If the same shield is refreshed 20 times it will become unstable and explode, removing it.

The damage dealt and shield bonus will increase with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Weapon of Light
value2.info_text:
Infuse your weapon with the power of the Sun, adding 23, 44, 60, 73, 85 light damage on each melee hit.

Additionally, if you have a temporary damage shield active, melee attacks will increase its power by 11, 21, 29, 36, 42.

If the same shield is refreshed 20 times it will become unstable and explode, removing it.

The damage dealt and shield bonus will increase with your Spellpower.

value.info_text:
In a pure display of power, you project a ranged melee attack, doing 146%, 169%, 187%, 202%, 215% weapon damage.

If the target is outside of melee range, you have a chance to project a second attack against it for 62%, 90%, 113%, 132%, 150% weapon damage.

The second strike chance (which increases with distance) is 10%, 19%, 26%, 32%, 37% at range 2 and 37%, 55%, 65%, 71%, 75% at the maximum range of 2, 4, 6, 8, 10.

The range will increase with your Strength.
value.name: Wave of Power

value2.name: Wave of Power
value2.info_text:
In a pure display of power, you project a ranged melee attack, doing 146%, 169%, 187%, 202%, 215% weapon damage.

If the target is outside of melee range, you have a chance to project a second attack against it for 62%, 90%, 113%, 132%, 150% weapon damage.

The second strike chance (which increases with distance) is 10%, 19%, 26%, 32%, 37% at range 2 and 37%, 55%, 65%, 71%, 75% at the maximum range of 2, 4, 6, 8, 10.

The range will increase with your Strength.

value.name: Weapon of Wrath
value.info_text:
Your weapon attacks burn with righteous fury, dealing 28%, 62%, 74%, 80%, 84% of your lost HP as additional Fire damage (up to 277, 376, 452, 517, 575, Current: 0).

Targets struck are also afflicted with a Martyrdom effect that causes them to take 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28% of all damage they deal for 4 turns.

value2.name: Weapon of Wrath
value2.info_text:
Your weapon attacks burn with righteous fury, dealing 28%, 62%, 74%, 80%, 84% of your lost HP as additional Fire damage (up to 277, 376, 452, 517, 575, Current: 0).

Targets struck are also afflicted with a Martyrdom effect that causes them to take 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28% of all damage they deal for 4 turns.

value.name: Second Life
value.info_text: Any attack that would drop you below 1 hit point instead triggers Second Life, deactivating the talent, setting your hit points to 1, then healing you for 11, 23, 32, 41, 48.

value2.name: Second Life
value2.info_text: Any attack that would drop you below 1 hit point instead triggers Second Life, deactivating the talent, setting your hit points to 1, then healing you for 11, 23, 32, 41, 48.

value.name: Absorption Strike
value.info_text:
You strike your foe with your two handed weapon, dealing 171%, 196%, 215%, 232%, 246% weapon damage.

If the attack hits, all foes in radius 2 will have their light resistance reduced by 6%, 11%, 16%, 20%, 24% and their damage reduced by 2%, 7%, 11%, 15%, 19% for 5 turns.

value2.name: Absorption Strike
value2.info_text:
You strike your foe with your two handed weapon, dealing 171%, 196%, 215%, 232%, 246% weapon damage.

If the attack hits, all foes in radius 2 will have their light resistance reduced by 6%, 11%, 16%, 20%, 24% and their damage reduced by 2%, 7%, 11%, 15%, 19% for 5 turns.

value.info_text:
While wielding a two handed weapon, your critical strike chance is increased by 3%, 6%, 8%, 10%, 12%, and your melee criticals instill you with righteous strength, increasing all physical and light damage you deal by 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17%, stacking up to 3 times.

In addition, your melee critical strikes leave a lasting lightburn on the target, dealing 79, 108, 129, 148, 164 light damage over 5 turns and reducing opponents armour by 7, 17, 24, 30, 36.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
value.name: Righteous Strength

value2.info_text:

value2.name: Righteous Strength

value.name: Flash of the Blade
value.info_text:
Infuse your two handed weapon with light while spinning around.

All creatures in radius one take 90%, 107%, 120%, 131%, 141% weapon damage.

In addition while spinning your weapon shines so much it deals 91%, 116%, 135%, 152%, 166% light weapon damage to all foes in radius 2.

At level 4 your spinning blade creates a shield that blocks all damage for 1 turn.

value2.name: Flash of the Blade
value2.info_text:
Infuse your two handed weapon with light while spinning around.

In addition while spinning your weapon shines so much it deals 91%, 116%, 135%, 152%, 166% light weapon damage to all foes in radius 2.

At level 4 your spinning blade creates a shield that blocks all damage for 1 turn.

value.name: Totality
value.info_text:
Increases your light and darkness resistance penetration by 26%, 39%, 49%, 55%, 61% for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, and reduces the cooldown of all Celestial skills by 2, 3, 5, 6, 7.

The resistance penetration will increase with your Cunning.

value2.name: Totality
value2.info_text:

The resistance penetration will increase with your Cunning.

value.name: Corona
value.info_text:
Each time one of your spells criticals, you project a bolt of light or shadow at up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 targets within radius 6, doing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 light damage or 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 darkness damage per bolt.

This effect costs 2 positive or 2 negative energy each time it's triggered, and will not activate if either your positive or negative energy is below 2.

The damage scales with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Corona
value2.info_text:
Each time one of your spells criticals, you project a bolt of light or shadow at up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 targets within radius 6, doing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 light damage or 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 darkness damage per bolt.

This effect costs 2 positive or 2 negative energy each time it's triggered, and will not activate if either your positive or negative energy is below 2.

The damage scales with your Spellpower.

value.name: Darkest Light
value.info_text:
This powerful spell grants you 21, 29, 34, 38, 43 bonus invisibility, but converts 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 negative energy into positive energy each turn. Once your positive energy exceeds your negative energy, or you deactivate the talent, the effect ends in an explosion of light, converting all of your positive energy into damage and inflicting an additional 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 damage to everything in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

As you become invisible, you fade out of phase with reality; all your damage is reduced by 50%.

You may not cast Twilight while this spell is active, and you should take off your light source; otherwise, others will spot you with ease.

The invisibility bonus will increase with your Cunning, and the explosion damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Darkest Light
value2.info_text:
This powerful spell grants you 21, 29, 34, 38, 43 bonus invisibility, but converts 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 negative energy into positive energy each turn. Once your positive energy exceeds your negative energy, or you deactivate the talent, the effect ends in an explosion of light, converting all of your positive energy into damage and inflicting an additional 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 damage to everything in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

As you become invisible, you fade out of phase with reality; all your damage is reduced by 50%.

You may not cast Twilight while this spell is active, and you should take off your light source; otherwise, others will spot you with ease.

The invisibility bonus will increase with your Cunning, and the explosion damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Shield of Light
value.info_text:
Infuse your shield with light, healing you for 14, 18, 22, 25, 28 each time you take damage at the expense of up to 2 positive energy.

If you do not have any positive energy, the effect will not trigger.

Additionally, once per turn successful melee attacks will trigger a bonus attack with your shield dealing 45%, 60%, 71%, 81%, 89% light damage.

The healing done will increase with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Shield of Light
value2.info_text:
Infuse your shield with light, healing you for 14, 18, 22, 25, 28 each time you take damage at the expense of up to 2 positive energy.

If you do not have any positive energy, the effect will not trigger.

Additionally, once per turn successful melee attacks will trigger a bonus attack with your shield dealing 45%, 60%, 71%, 81%, 89% light damage.

The healing done will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Brandish
value.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon doing 201%, 244%, 276%, 303%, 328% damage, and with a shield strike doing 150%, 172%, 188%, 201%, 214% damage. If the shield strike connects, your shield will explode in a burst of light that inflicts 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 light damage on all targets except yourself within radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 of the target, and light up all tiles in that radius.

The light damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Brandish
value2.info_text:

If the shield strike connects, your shield will explode in a burst of light that inflicts 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 light damage on all targets except yourself within radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 of the target, and light up all tiles in that radius.

The light damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Retribution
value.info_text:
Retribution negates half of all damage you take while it is active. Once Retribution has negated 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 damage, your shield will explode in a burst of light, inflicting damage equal to the amount negated in a radius of 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 and deactivating the talent.

The amount absorbed will increase with your Spellpower.

value2.info_text:

value.info_text:
You demonstrate your dedication to the light with a measured attack striking once with your weapon for 75%, 94%, 109%, 121%, 132% damage and once with your shield for 75%, 94%, 109%, 121%, 132% damage.

If the first strike connects 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 random talent cooldowns are reduced by 1.

If the second strike connects you are cleansed of 1 debuffs.

value.name: Healing Light
value.info_text:
An invigorating ray of Sunlight shines upon you, healing your body for 306, 415, 500, 571, 635 life.

The amount healed will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Bathe in Light
value.info_text:
A magical zone of Sunlight appears around you, healing and shielding all within a radius of 2 for 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 per turn and increasing healing effects on everyone within by 26%, 35%, 42%, 48%, 53%. The effect lasts for 4, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns.

Existing damage shields will be added to instead of overwritten and have their duration set to 2 if it isn't higher.

If the same shield is refreshed 20 times it will become unstable and explode, removing it.

It also lights up the affected zone.

The amount healed will increase with the Magic stat

The amount healed will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Searing Sight
value.info_text:
Your Radiance is so powerful it burns all foes caught in it, doing up to 22, 30, 36, 41, 46 light damage (reduced with distance) to all foes caught inside.

At level 4 the light is so bright it has 7%, 13%, 17%, 20%, 22% chance to daze them for 3 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.

value2.info_text:

value.name: Judgement
value.info_text: Fire a glowing orb of light at each enemy within your Radiance. Each orb will slowly follow its target until it connects dealing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 light damage to anything else it contacts along the way. When the target is reached the orb will explode dealing 100, 135, 163, 186, 207 light damage and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt. This powerful ability will dim your Radiance, reducing its radius to 1 for 5 turns.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Twilight
value.info_text:
You stand between the darkness and the light, allowing you to convert 15 positive energy into 89, 142, 186, 225, 260 negative energy.

Learning this talent will change the default level of positive and negative energies to 22%, 28%, 32%, 34%, 36% of their maximum. Each turn, the energies will slowly fall/rise to this value, instead of 0.

The negative energy gain will increase with your Cunning.

value.name: Jumpgate
value.info_text:
Create a shadow jumpgate at your current location. As long as you sustain this spell, you can use 'Jumpgate: Teleport' to instantly travel to the jumpgate, as long as you are within 13, 15, 16, 18, 19 tiles of it.

Note that any stairs underneath the jumpgate will be unusable while the spell is sustained, and you may need to cancel this sustain in order to leave certain locations.

At talent level 4, you learn to create and sustain a second jumpgate.

The duration will improve with your Cunning.

value.info_text:

The duplicate has 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% of the target's life, 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% all damage resistance, +50% darkness resistance and -50% light resistance.

The duration, life and all damage resistance scale with your Cunning and this ability will not work on bosses.

value.name: Warp Blade
value.info_text:
Attack the target with your melee weapons for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157%.

If the attack hits you'll warp the target, dealing 11, 22, 30, 37, 43 temporal and 11, 22, 30, 37, 43 physical damage, and may stun, blind, pin, or confuse them for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The bonus damage improves with your Spellpower.

value.name: Weapon Folding
value.info_text:
Folds a single dimension of your weapons (or ammo) upon itself, adding 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 temporal damage to your strikes and increasing your armour penetration by 11, 21, 29, 36, 42.

The armour penetration and damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Braided Blade
value.info_text:
Attack your foes in a frontal arc, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage. If two or more targets are hit you'll braid their lifelines for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Braided targets take 100%, 135%, 163%, 186%, 207% of all damage dealt to other braided targets.

The damage transfered by the braid effect scales with your Spellpower.

Attack the target with your melee weapons for 90%, 103%, 112%, 121%, 128% damage. If the attack hits you'll teleport next to up to 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 random enemies, attacking for 90%, 103%, 112%, 121%, 128% damage.

Temporal Assault can hit the same target multiple times and at talent level five you get an additional teleport.
value.name: Temporal Assault
Impact
value.info_text:
Your weapons and ammo hit with greater force, dealing an additional 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 physical damage and having a 11%, 21%, 25%, 25%, 25% chance to daze on hit.

The daze chance and damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Threaded Arrow
value.info_text:
Fire a shot doing 166%, 189%, 207%, 222%, 235% temporal damage. If the arrow hits you recover 11, 14, 17, 20, 22 Paradox.

This attack does not consume ammo.

value.name: Singularity Arrow
value.info_text:
Fire a shot doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage. When the arrow reaches its destination it will draw in creatures in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 and inflict 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 physical damage.

Each target moved beyond the first deals an additional 50, 67, 81, 93, 103 physical damage (up to 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 bonus damage).

Targets take reduced damage the further they are from the epicenter (20% less per tile).

The additional damage scales with your Spellpower.

value.name: Arrow Stitching
value.info_text:
Fire upon the target for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage and summon up to 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 temporal clones (depending on available space).

These clones are out of phase with normal reality and deal 50% damage but shoot through friendly targets.

At talent level three and five you can summon an additional clone.

value.name: Precognition
value.info_text:
You peer into the future, sensing creatures and traps in a radius of 22, 26, 30, 32, 35 for 6, 9, 12, 14, 16 turns.

If you know Foresight you'll gain additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits (equal to your Foresight bonuses) while Precognition is active.

The detection radius will scale with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Precognition
value2.info_text:
You peer into the future, allowing you to explore your surroundings for 6, 9, 12, 14, 16 turns. When Precognition expires, you'll return to the point in time you first cast the spell. Dying with precognition active will end the spell prematurely.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

Splitting the timeline is difficult, you will only be protected after the current turn ends.

value.name: Moment of Prescience
value.info_text:
You pull your awareness fully into the moment, increasing your stealth detection, see invisibility, defense, and accuracy by 5, 9, 12, 15, 17 for 4, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

If you have Spin Fate active when you cast this spell, you'll gain a bonus to these values equal to 50% of your spin.

This spell takes no time to cast.

You've learned to make minor corrections in how future events unfold. Each time you make a saving throw, all your saves are increased by 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 (stacking up to a maximum increase of 6, 13, 20, 25, 31 for each value).

The effect will last 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns, but the duration will refresh everytime it's reapplied.
value.name: Spin Fate

value.info_text:
Gain 20, 27, 32, 36, 39 defense and 11%, 14%, 17%, 19%, 21% chance to shrug off critical hits.

If you have Precognition or See the Threads active these bonuses will be added to those effects, granting additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits.

These bonuses scale with your Magic stat.
value.name: Foresight

value2.info_text: When the duration of your Precognition expires, you'll be given a vision of your surroundings, sensing terrain, enemies, objects, and traps in a 5, 8, 11, 13, 15 radius.
value2.name: Foresight

value.info_text:
Choose an activatable spell that's not targeted. When you take damage that reduces your life below 27%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% the spell will automatically cast.

This spell will cast even if it is currently on cooldown, will not consume a turn or resources, and uses the talent level of Contingency or its own, whichever is lower.

This effect can only occur once every 50 turns and takes place after the damage is resolved.

Current Contingency Spell: None
value.name: Contingency
See the Threads
value.info_text:
You peer into three possible futures, allowing you to explore each for 11, 17, 21, 25, 28 turns. When the effect expires, you'll choose which of the three futures becomes your present.

If you know Foresight you'll gain additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits (equal to your Foresight values) while See the Threads is active.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

If you die in any thread you'll revert the timeline to the point when you first cast the spell and the effect will end.

This spell may only be used once per zone level.

value.name: Entropic Field
value.info_text:
You encase yourself in a field that slows incoming projectiles by 41%, 53%, 62%, 69%, 76%, and increases your physical resistance by 20%, 26%, 31%, 34%, 38%.

The effect will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Energy Decomposition
value.info_text:
Partially dissipates all incoming damage, reducing it by 30%, up to a maximum of 100, 135, 163, 186, 207.

The maximum damage reduction will scale with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Energy Decomposition
value2.info_text:
Partially dissipates all incoming energy damage (all except mind and physical damage), reducing it by 30%, up to a maximum of 100, 135, 163, 186, 207.

The maximum damage reduction will scale with your Spellpower.

value.info_text:
You sap the target's energy and add it to your own, placing up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 random talents on cooldown for 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.

For each talent put on cooldown, you reduce the cooldown of one of your chronomancy talents currently on cooldown by 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns and deal 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 temporal damage to the target.

The damage done will scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Energy Absorption

value2.name: Energy Absorption
value2.info_text:
You sap the target's energy and add it to your own, placing up to 1, 2, 3, 3, 3 random talents on cooldown for 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns. For each talent put on cooldown, you reduce the cooldown of one of your chronomancy talents currently on cooldown by 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.

The number of talents affected scales with your Paradox.

value.name: Redux
value.info_text: For the next 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns chronomancy spells with a cooldown of 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 or less have a cooldown of one.

value2.name: Redux
value2.info_text:
You may recast the next activated chronomancy spell (up to talent level 1.3, 2.6, 3.9, 5.2, 6.5) that you cast within the next 5 turns on the turn following its initial casting.

The Paradox cost of the initial spell will be paid each time it is cast, and the second casting will still consume a turn.

This spell takes no time to cast.

value.name: Entropy
value.info_text:
Over the next 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns all beneficial timed effects on the target tick twice as fast.

Each timed effect affected by this talent deals 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 temporal damage to the target.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Disentangle
value.info_text:
Disentangle the timeline, reducing your Paradox by 52, 70, 84, 97, 107 and creating an anomaly. This spell will never produce a major anomaly.

Additionally you recover 17%, 42%, 62%, 77%, 89% more Paradox from random anomalies (217%, 242%, 262%, 277%, 289% total).

The Paradox reduction will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Preserve Pattern
value.info_text:
While active, 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% of all damage you take increases your Paradox by 47%, 34%, 28%, 25%, 22% of the damage absorbed over 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

The amount of Paradox damage you recieve will be reduced by your Spellpower.

value.name: Trim Threads
value.info_text:
Deals 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 temporal damage over 4 turns to all other targets in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2. If the target is slain before the effect expires you'll recover 2, 5, 7, 10, 13 Paradox.

If the target is hit by an Anomaly the remaining damage will be done instantly.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Bias Weave
value.info_text:
You've learned to focus most anomalies when they occur and may choose the target area with 24%, 55%, 68%, 75%, 80% probability.

You also may bias the type of anomaly effects you produce with 24%, 55%, 68%, 75%, 80% probability.

Additionally random anomalies only cost you 75%, 44%, 31%, 24%, 19% of a turn rather than a full turn when they occur.

Major anomalies, those occuring when your modified Paradox is over 600, are not affected by this talent.

value.name: Spin Fate
value.info_text:
Each time you take damage from someone else you gain one spin, increasing your defense and saves by 3, 5, 7, 9, 10 for three turns.

This effect may occur once per turn and stacks up to three spin (for a maximum bonus of 9, 15, 21, 27, 30).

value.name: Webs of Fate
value.info_text:
Activate to remove pins and stuns. You also gain 24%, 28%, 31%, 32%, 33% pin and stun immunity for 5 turns.

If you have Spin Fate active these bonuses will be increased by 33% per spin (up to a maximum of 49%, 57%, 62%, 65%, 67%).

While Webs of Fate is active you may gain one additional spin per turn. These bonuses will scale with your Spellpower.

When Spin Fate is triggered you reduce the triggering damage by 25%, 28%, 30%, 31%, 32%.

This effect scales with your Spellpower.
value.name: Fateweaver
Seal Fate
value.info_text:
Activate to Seal Fate for 5 turns. When you damage a target while Seal Fate is active you have a 50% chance to increase the duration of one detrimental status effect on it by one turn.

If you have Spin Fate active the chance will be increased by 33% per Spin (to a maximum of 100% at three Spin.)

This can occur at most 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 times per turn. While Seal Fate is active you may gain one additional spin per turn.

value.name: Repulsion Blast
value.info_text:
Sends out a blast wave of gravity in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone, dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 base physical damage and knocking back targets caught in the area.

Targets knocked into walls or other targets take 50% additional damage and deal 50% damage to targets they're knocked into.

Closer targets will be knocked back further and the damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value2.info_text:
Sends out a blast wave of gravity in a 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 radius cone, dealing 114, 155, 186, 213, 236 physical damage and knocking back creatures caught in the area. This deals 50% extra damage to pinned targets, in addition to the knockback.

The blast wave may hit targets more then once, depending on the radius and the knockback effect.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
value2.name: Repulsion Blast

value.name: Repulsion Field

The blast wave may hit targets more then once, depending on the radius and the knockback effect.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.

value.name: Gravity Spike

Each target moved beyond the first deals an additional 50, 67, 81, 93, 103 physical damage (up to 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 bonus damage).

Targets take reduced damage the further they are from the epicenter (20% less per tile).

The damage dealt will scale with your Spellpower.

value2.info_text:

value.name: Gravity Locus

Create a gravity field around you that slows incoming projectiles by 40%, 47%, 51%, 54%, 56% and protects you from all gravity effects.

While this spell is active creatures that hit you in melee combat will take 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 physical damage and have their knockback resistance reduced by half for two turns.

The projectile slowing and damage will scale with your spellpower.

Increases local gravity in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns, dealing 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 physical damage and slowing the movement speed of all affected targets by 40%, 47%, 51%, 54%, 56%.

The damage done will scale with your Spellpower.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Carbon Spikes
value.info_text:
Fragile spikes of carbon protrude from your flesh, clothing, and armor, increasing your armor rating by 32, 44, 53, 60, 67 and inflicting 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 bleed damage over six turns on attackers. Each time you're struck, the armor increase will be reduced by 1. Each turn the spell will regenerate 1 armor up to its starting value.

If the armor increase from the spell ever falls below 1, the sustain will deactivate and the effect will end.

The armor and bleed damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Carbon Spikes
value2.info_text:

value.name: Destabilize
value.info_text:

If the target dies while also under the effects of continuum destabilization, all explosion damage will be done as temporal damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

If the target dies while also under the effects of continuum destabilization, all explosion damage will be done as temporal damage.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.

Quantum Spike deals 50% additional damage to targets affected by temporal destabilization and/or continuum destabilization.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value.info_text:
Over the next 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, you attempt to remove the target from the timeline. Its resistances will be reduced by 32%, 39%, 43%, 47%, 49%, and if you manage to kill it while the spell is in effect, you'll be returned to the point in time you cast this spell and the target will be slain.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

The duration will scale with your Paradox and the resistance penalty will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
value.name: Cease to Exist
Fade From Time
value.info_text:
You partially remove yourself from the timeline for 10 turns.

This increases your resistance to all damage by 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66%, reduces the duration of all detrimental effects on you by 32%, 39%, 43%, 47%, 49%, and reduces all damage you deal by 20%.

The resistance bonus, effect reduction, and damage penalty will gradually lose power over the duration of the spell.

The effects scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.

value.name: Paradox Clone
value.info_text:
You summon your future self to fight alongside you for 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns. At some point in the future, you'll be pulled into the past to fight alongside your past self after the initial effect ends.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.

value.name: Warp Mine Toward
value.info_text:
Lay Warp Mines in a radius of 1 that teleport enemies to you and inflict 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 physical and 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 temporal (warp) damage.

The mines are hidden traps (0 detection and 1 disarm power based on your Magic) and last for 2 turns.

The damage caused by your Warp Mines will improve with your Spellpower.

Using this talent will trigger the cooldown on Warp Mine Away.

value.name: Warp Mine Away
value.info_text:
Lay Warp Mines in a radius of 1 that teleport enemies away from you and inflict 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 physical and 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 temporal (warp) damage.

The mines are hidden traps (0 detection and 1 disarm power based on your Magic) and last for 2 turns.

The damage caused by your Warp Mines will improve with your Spellpower.

Using this talent will trigger the cooldown on Warp Mine Away.

Use to set your preferred Paradox. While resting or waiting you'll adjust your Paradox towards this number over 19, 18, 15, 13, 10 turns.

The time it takes you to adjust your Paradox scales down with your Spellpower to a minimum of 10 turns.

Preferred Paradox : 0

Spellpower for Chronomancy : 10, 25, 50, 75, 100

Paradox Sustain Modifier : +0

Total Modifed Paradox : 280, 250, 200, 150, 100

The time it takes you to adjust your Paradox scales down with your Spellpower to a minimum of 10 turns.

value2.name: Spacetime Tuning

value.info_text:
Inflicts 114, 155, 186, 213, 236 temporal damage, and attempts to stun all creatures in a radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 ball for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Stop

value.info_text:
Creates a time distortion in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 that lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns, decreasing global speed by 60% for 3 turns and inflicting 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 temporal damage each turn to all targets within the area.

The slow effect and damage dealt will scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Slow

value.info_text: Your mastery of spacetime reduces the cooldown of Banish, Dimensional Step, Swap, and Temporal Wake by 1, 3, 4, 5, 5, and the cooldown of Wormhole by 3, 6, 8, 10, 11. Also improves your Spellpower for purposes of hitting targets with chronomancy effects that may cause continuum destabilization (Banish, Time Skip, etc.), as well as your chance of overcoming continuum destabilization, by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%.
value.name: Spacetime Mastery
Static History
value.info_text:
By slightly reorganizing history, you reduce your Paradox by 135, 183, 220, 251, 279 and temporarily stabilize the timeline; this allows chronomancy to be used without chance of failure for 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns (backfires and anomalies may still occur).

The paradox reduction will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Quantum Feed
value.info_text:
You've learned to boost your magic through your control over the spacetime continuum. Increases your Magic and your Spell Save by 11, 16, 19, 23, 26.

The effect will scale with your Willpower.

value.name: Moment of Prescience
value.info_text:
You pull your awareness fully into the moment, increasing your stealth detection, see invisibility, defense, and accuracy by 5, 9, 12, 15, 17 for 4, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

If you have Spin Fate active when you cast this spell, you'll gain a bonus to these values equal to 50% of your spin.

This spell takes no time to cast.

value.name: Gather the Threads
value.info_text:
You begin to gather energy from other timelines. Your Spellpower will increase by 11, 21, 29, 37, 45 on the first turn and 1.83, 3.46, 4.88, 6.20, 7.43 more each additional turn.

The effect ends either when you cast a spell, or after five turns.

Eacn turn the effect is active, your Paradox will be reduced by 4, 8, 12, 15, 18.

This spell will not break Spacetime Tuning, nor will it be broken by activating Spacetime Tuning.

value.name: Entropic Field
value.info_text:
You encase yourself in a field that slows incoming projectiles by 41%, 53%, 62%, 69%, 76%, and increases your physical resistance by 20%, 26%, 31%, 34%, 38%.

The effect will scale with your Spellpower.

You partially remove yourself from the timeline for 10 turns.

This increases your resistance to all damage by 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66%, reduces the duration of all detrimental effects on you by 32%, 39%, 43%, 47%, 49%, and reduces all damage you deal by 20%.

The resistance bonus, effect reduction, and damage penalty will gradually lose power over the duration of the spell.

The effects scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Fade From Time
Paradox Clone
value.info_text:
You summon your future self to fight alongside you for 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns. At some point in the future, you'll be pulled into the past to fight alongside your past self after the initial effect ends.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

value.name: Displace Damage
value.info_text: You bend space around you, displacing 6%, 10%, 13%, 15%, 16% of any damage you receive onto a random enemy within range.

You surround yourself with a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 distortion of gravity, knocking back and dealing 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 physical damage to all creatures inside it. The effect lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns. Deals 50% extra damage to pinned targets, in addition to the knockback.

The blast wave may hit targets more then once, depending on the radius and the knockback effect.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Repulsion Field
Temporal Clone
value.info_text:
Clones the target creature for up to 6, 8, 10, 12, 13 turns. The duration of the effect will be divided by half the target's rank, and the target will have have 52%, 56%, 60%, 62%, 65% of its normal life and deal 47%, 43%, 39%, 37%, 34% less damage.

If you clone a hostile creature the clone will target the creature it was cloned from.

The life and damage penalties will be lessened by your Spellpower.
You've learned to focus your control over the spacetime continuum, and quell anomalous effects. Increases your effective Willpower for anomaly calculations by 18%, 32%, 42%, 51%, 58%.
value.name: Paradox Mastery
Damage Smearing
value.info_text:
You convert 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% of all non-temporal damage you receive into temporal damage spread out over 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

This damage will bypass resistance and affinity.

Randomly teleports all targets within a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 around you. Targets will be teleported between 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 and 8, 11, 14, 16, 18 tiles from their current location.

If no targets are teleported the cooldown will be halved.

The chance of teleportion will scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Banish

value.info_text:
You manipulate the spacetime continuum in such a way that you switch places with another creature with in a range of 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. The targeted creature will be confused (power 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%) for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The spell's hit chance will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Swap
Temporal Wake
value.info_text:
Violently fold the space between yourself and another point within range.

You teleport to the target location, and leave a temporal wake behind that stuns for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns and deals 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical warp damage to targets in the path.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Weapon Folding
value.info_text:
Folds a single dimension of your weapons (or ammo) upon itself, adding 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 temporal damage to your strikes (31, 42, 51, 58, 64 for ammo) and reducing your Paradox by 0.8, 1.4, 2.0, 2.6, 3.1 every time you land an attack (1.6, 2.9, 4.1, 5.2, 6.2 for ammo).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Swap
value.info_text:
You manipulate the spacetime continuum in such a way that you switch places with another creature with in a range of 3, 4, 6, 7, 8. The targeted creature will be confused (power 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%) for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The spell's hit chance will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Displace Damage
value.info_text: Space bends around you, giving you a 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% chance to displace half of any damage you receive onto a random enemy within a radius of 2, 6, 8, 10, 11.

value.name: Temporal Wake
value.info_text:
Violently fold the space between yourself and another point within range. You move to the target location, and leave a temporal wake behind that stuns for 4 turns and inflicts 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 temporal damage to everything in the path.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower, and the range will increase with the talent level.

Learn to lay Warp Mines in a radius of 1 out to a range of 5, 6, 8, 9, 10.

Warp Mines teleport targets that trigger them either toward you or away from you depending on the type of mine used and inflict 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 physical and 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 temporal (warp) damage.

The mines are hidden traps (30, 43, 52, 61, 68 detection and 38, 54, 66, 76, 85 disarm power based on your Magic) and last for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

The damage caused by your Warp Mines will improve with your Spellpower.
value.name: Warp Mines
Wormhole
value.info_text:
You fold the space between yourself and a second point within a range of 5, 6, 8, 9, 10, creating a pair of wormholes. Any creature stepping on either wormhole will be teleported near the other (radius 6, 4, 3, 2, 2 accuracy).

The wormholes will last 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns and must be placed at least two tiles apart.

The chance of teleporting enemies will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Spatial Tether
value.info_text:
Tethers the target to the location for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns. For each tile the target moves away from the target location it has a 16%, 19%, 20%, 21%, 22% chance each turn of being teleported back to the tether.

The teleportation chance scales with your Spellpower.

value.name: Dimensional Anchor
value.info_text:
Create a radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 anti-telport field for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns. Enemies in the field will be anchored, preventing teleportation and taking 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal (warp) damage on teleport attempts.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Banish
value.info_text:
Randomly teleports all targets within a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 around you. Targets will be teleported between 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 and 8, 11, 14, 16, 18 tiles from their current location.

The teleport range will scale with your Paradox.

value.name: Wormhole
value.info_text:
You fold the space between yourself and a random point within range, creating a pair of wormholes. Any creature stepping on either wormhole will be teleported to the other. The wormholes will last 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

At level 4, you may choose the exit location target area (radius 6, 4, 3, 2, 2). The duration will scale with your Paradox.

Your mastery of spacetime reduces the cooldown of Banish, Dimensional Step, Swap, and Temporal Wake by 1, 3, 4, 5, 5, and the cooldown of Wormhole by 3, 6, 8, 10, 11. Also improves your Spellpower for purposes of hitting targets with chronomancy effects that may cause continuum destabilization (Banish, Time Skip, etc.), as well as your chance of overcoming continuum destabilization, by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%.
value.name: Spacetime Mastery
Dimensional Step
value.info_text:
Teleports you to up to 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 tiles away, to a targeted location in line of sight.

At talent level 5 you may swap positions with a target creature.

value2.info_text:
Teleports you to up to 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 tiles away, to a targeted location in line of sight. Additional talent points increase the range.

This spell takes no time to cast.

value.name: Dimensional Shift
Phase Shift
value.info_text: Phase shift yourself for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns; any damage greater than 10% of your maximum life will teleport you to an adjacent tile and be reduced by 50% (can only happen once per turn).

value.name: Phase Pulse
value.info_text:
When you teleport with Phase Pulse active you deal 23, 31, 37, 42, 47 physical and 23, 31, 37, 42, 47 temporal (warp) damage to all targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 around you.

For each space you move from your original location the damage is increased by 10% (to a maximum bonus of 100%). If the teleport fails, the blast radius and damage will be doubled.

This effect occurs both at the entrance and exist locations and the damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Spatial Fragments
value.info_text:
Fire three Spatial Fragments at the target that each inflict 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 physical and 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 temporal (warp) damage. If you target yourself you'll instead fire one Spatial Fragment at up to three targets within range.

If Fractured Space is fully charged the projectiles will be able to pierce through targets. This will consume your Fractured Space charges.

The damage scales with your Spellpower.

value.name: Discontinuity
value.info_text:
Create a void wall of length 3, 5, 7, 7, 9 that lasts 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns. Each turn the wall deals 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 physical and 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 temporal (warp) damage to all enemies within a radius of 1.

If Fractured Space is fully charged the wall will block movement, but not sight or projectiles. This will consume your Fractured Space charges.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Fractured Space
value.info_text:
Each time you deal warp damage Fractured Space gains one charge, up to a maximum of six charges. If you're not generating charges one charge will decay every other turn.

Each charge increases warp damage by 2%, 4%, 5%, 6%, 6% and gives your Warp damage a 4%, 9%, 11%, 12%, 13% chance to stun, blind, pin, or confuse affected targets for 3 turns.

If Fractured Space is fully charged, your Spatial Tears talents will consume them when cast and have bonus effects (see indvidual talent descriptions).

Current damage bonus: 0%

Current effect chance: 0%

value.name: Sphere of Destruction
value.info_text:
Create a Sphere of Destruction that travels towards the target location, inflicting 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 physical and 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 temporal (warp) damage in a radius of three.

If Fractured Space is fully charged the Sphere will remove a single sustain from targets it damages. This will consume your Fractured Space charges.

The sphere can hit a single target multiple times in one turn and the damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Strength of Purpose
value.info_text:
You've learned to boost your strength through your control of the spacetime continuum. Increases your Strength and your Physical Save by 12, 17, 20, 24, 27.

The effect will scale with your Willpower.

value.name: Invigorate
value.info_text:
For the next 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns, you recover 1.9, 3.2, 4.3, 5.1, 5.9 stamina each turn and all other talents on cooldown will refresh twice as fast as usual.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.

value.name: Quantum Feed
value.info_text:
You've learned to boost your magic through your control over the spacetime continuum. Increases your Magic and your Spell Save by 11, 16, 19, 23, 26.

The effect will scale with your Willpower.

value.name: Damage Smearing
value.info_text:
For the next 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns, you convert all non-temporal damage you receive into temporal damage spread out over six turns.

value.name: Stop
value.info_text:
Inflicts 114, 155, 186, 213, 236 temporal damage, and attempts to stun all creatures in a radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 ball for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The stun duration will scale with your Paradox, and the damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.

value.name: Slow
value.info_text:
Creates a time distortion in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 that lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns, decreasing global speed by 41%, 53%, 60%, 60%, 60% for 3 turns and inflicting 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 temporal damage each turn to all targets within the area.

The slow effect and damage dealt will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
When you move you gain 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35% movement speed for one turn. This effect stacks up to three times.
value.name: Celerity

value2.name: Celerity
value2.info_text: Increases your movement speed by 18%, 30%, 41%, 51%, 60%, and switching between already equipped weapon sets (default hotkey q) no longer takes a turn.

value.name: Time Dilation
value.info_text:
Time Dilates around you, reducing the speed of all enemies within a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 by up to 33%, 38%, 41%, 43%, 44%. This effect builds gradually over three turns and loses 11%, 12%, 13%, 14%, 14% power each time you move.

Movement via teleport will not lower the power and the speed decrease will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Haste
value.info_text:
Increases your movement speed by 11%, 12%, 13%, 14%, 14% per stack of Celerity and your attack, spell, and mind speed by 11%, 12%, 13%, 14%, 14% per stack of Time Dilation for the next 4 game turns.

The speed increase will scale with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Haste
value2.info_text:
Increases your global speed by 53%, 66%, 76%, 84%, 91% for the next 4 game turns. Each time you move with this effect active, you'll leave behind an image of yourself for two turns that may draw enemy attacks.

The speed increase will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.

value.name: Time Stop
value.info_text:
Gain 2 turns. During this time your damage will be reduced by 66%, 61%, 58%, 56%, 55%.

Time must be fully dilated in order to use this talent.

The damage reduction penalty will be lessened by your Spellpower.

Empowers the selected chronomancy spell, increasing spellpower when casting it by 15%, 31%, 43%, 51%, 57%.

Current Empowered Spell: None
value.name: Empower

value.info_text:
Extends the duration of the selected chronomancy spell by 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Current Extended Spell: None
value.name: Extension

value.info_text:
Reduces the cooldown of the selected chronomancy spell by 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Current Matrix Spell: None
value.name: Matrix

value.info_text:
Reduces the casting speed of the selected chronomancy spell by 15%, 31%, 43%, 51%, 57%.

Current Quickened Spell: None
value.name: Quicken

value.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65, and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using swords, axes, maces, knives, or bows.

You now also use your Magic in place of Strength when equipping weapons, calculating weapon damage, and physical power.

These bonuses override rather than stack with weapon mastery, knife mastery, and bow mastery.
value.name: Strength of Purpose
Invigorate
value.info_text:
For the next 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns, you recover 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 life per turn and most other talents on cooldown will refresh twice as fast as usual.

The amount healed will increase with your Spellpower.

When a single hit deals more than 37%, 30%, 26%, 23%, 21% of your maximum life another you appears and takes 40%, 47%, 51%, 54%, 56% of the damage as well as 20%, 23%, 25%, 27%, 28% of all other damage you take for the rest of the turn.

The clone is out of phase with this reality and deals 50% less damage but its arrows will pass through friendly targets. After 2 turns it returns to its own timeline.

This effect can only occur once per turn and the amount of damage split scales with your Spellpower.
value.name: Guardian Unity
Breach
value.info_text:
Attack the target with either your bow or melee weapons for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage.

If the attack hits you'll breach the target's immunities, reducing armor hardiness, stun, pin, blindness, and confusion immunity by 50% for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Breach chance scales with your Spellpower.

value.name: Temporal Hounds
value.info_text:
Upon activation summon a Temporal Hound. Every 35, 21, 17, 15, 14 turns another hound will be summoned, up to a maximum of three hounds. If a hound dies you'll summon a new hound in 35, 21, 17, 15, 14 turns.

Your hounds inherit your increased damage percent and have 9%, 16%, 21%, 25%, 28% physical resistance and 38%, 67%, 87%, 100%, 100% temporal resistance.

Hounds will get, 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Strength, 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Dexterity, 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Constitution, 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Magic, 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Willpower, and 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Cunning ,based on your Spellpower.

While Temporal Hounds is active your arrows will shoot through friendly targets.

value.name: Command Hounds: Blink
value.info_text:
Command your Temporal Hounds to teleport to the targeted location. If you target a creature with this effect your hounds will set that creature as their target.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 defense and 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52% resist all after any teleport.

At talent level five, if you're not at your maximum number of hounds when you cast this spell a new one will be summoned.

The teleportation bonuses scale with your Spellpower.

Your hounds can now survive for up to 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns after their hit points are reduced below 1. While in this state they deal 50% less damage but are immune to additional damage.

Command Blink will now regenerate your hounds for 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 life per turn and increase their global speed by 40%, 47%, 51%, 54%, 56% for five turns. Hounds below 1 life when this effect occurs will have the bonuses doubled.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% stun, blind, confusion, and pin resistance.

The regeneration and haste effects scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Temporal Vigour

value.info_text:
Command your Temporal Hounds to breathe time, dealing 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 temporal damage and reducing the stats of all targets in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone.

Affected targets will have their stats reduced by 9, 12, 13, 15, 16 for 3 turns. You are not immune to the breath of your own hounds, but your hounds are immune to stat damage from other hounds.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% temporal damage affinity.
value.name: Command Hounds: Breathe

value.info_text:
Your Weapon Folding and Impact spells now deal an additional 70%, 77%, 81%, 83%, 85% damage in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

The damage percent will scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Frayed Threads
Thread the Needle
value.info_text:
Attack with your bow or dual-weapons for 155%, 170%, 181%, 191%, 199% damage.

If you use your bow you'll shoot a beam and each target hit will reduce the cooldown of one Blade Threading spell currently on cooldown by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

If you use your dual-weapons you'll attack all targets within a radius of one around you and each target hit will reduce the cooldown of one Bow Threading spell currently on cooldown by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

At talent level five cooldowns are reduced by two.

Your Bow Threading and Blade Threading spells now deal 23%, 28%, 31%, 33%, 34% more weapon damage if you did not have the appropriate weapon equipped when you initated the attack.

The damage percent will scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Blended Threads
Twin Threads
value.info_text:
Summons a blade warden and a bow warden from an alternate timeline for 6, 8, 10, 12, 13 turns. The wardens are out of phase with this reality and deal 44%, 41%, 39%, 38%, 37% less damage but the bow warden's arrows will pass through friendly targets.

Each warden knows all Threaded Combat, Temporal Guardian, and Blade Threading or Bow Threading spells you know.

The damage penalty will be lessened by your Spellpower.

value.name: Temporal Clone
value.info_text:
Pulls a medium, medium, big, big, huge size or smaller copy of the target from another timeline; the copy stays for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns. The copy and the target will be compelled to attack each other immediately.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.

value.name: See the Threads
value.info_text:
You peer into three possible futures, allowing you to explore each for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. When the effect expires, you'll choose which of the three futures becomes your present. Note that seeing visions of your own death can still be fatal.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

This spell takes no time to cast.

value.name: Rethread
value.info_text:
Rethread the timeline, dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 temporal damage to the target before moving on to a second target.

Rethread can hit up to 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 targets up to 10 grids apart, and will never hit the same one twice; nor will it hit the caster.

Each time it jumps target the damage is reduced by 33%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Rethread
value2.info_text:
Creates a wake of temporal energy that deals 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 damage in a beam, as you attempt to rethread the timeline. Affected targets may be stunned, blinded, pinned, or confused for 3 turns.

Each target you hit with Rethread will reduce your Paradox by 1.6, 2.9, 4.1, 5.2, 6.2.

The damage will increase with your Paradox and Spellpower.

value.name: Temporal Fugue
value.info_text:
For the next 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns two alternate versions of you enter your timeline. While the effect is active all damage done by you or your copies is reduced by two thirds and all damage recieved is split between the three of you.

Temporal Fugue does not normally cooldown while active. You may take direct control of your clones.

Your Rethread now braids the lifelines of all targets it hits for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. Braided targets take 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52% of all damage dealt to other braided targets.

The amount of damage shared will scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Braid Lifelines
Cease to Exist
value.info_text:
Over the next 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, you attempt to remove the target from the timeline, lowering all its resistance by 38%, 47%, 52%, 56%, 58%.

If you manage to kill the target while the spell is in effect, you'll be returned to the point in time you cast this spell and the target will be slain.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

The resistance penalty will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Static History
value.info_text:
By slightly reorganizing history, you reduce your Paradox by 135, 183, 220, 251, 279 and temporarily stabilize the timeline; this allows chronomancy to be used without chance of failure for 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns (backfires and anomalies may still occur).

The paradox reduction will increase with your Spellpower.

Pull a bolt of temporal energy back through time. The bolt will home in on your location, dealing 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 temporal damage to enemies, and reducing the cooldown of one chronomancy talent on cooldown by one turn per enemy hit.

value.name: Epidemic
value.info_text:
Infects the target with a very contagious disease, doing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 damage per turn for 6 turns.

If any blight damage from non-diseases hits the target, the epidemic may activate and spread a random disease to nearby targets within a radius 2 ball.

The chance to spread increases with the blight damage dealt and is 100% if it is at least 31%, 23%, 19%, 16%, 14% of the target's maximum life.

Creatures suffering from that disease will also suffer healing reduction (45%, 51%, 56%, 60%, 63%) and diseases immunity reduction (38%, 48%, 55%, 60%, 64%).

Epidemic is an extremely potent disease; as such, it fully ignores the target's diseases immunity.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower, and the spread chance increases with the amount of blight damage dealt.

The chance to transfer each effect increases with your Spellpower.

value.name: Ambuscade
value.info_text:
You take full control of your own shadow for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Your shadow possesses your talents and stats, has 56%, 62%, 66%, 68%, 70% life and deals 75%, 83%, 88%, 92%, 95% damage, -30% all resistances, -100% light resistance and 100% darkness resistance.

Your shadow is permanently stealthed (63, 79, 91, 101, 110 power), and all melee damage it deals is converted to darkness damage.

If you release control early or if it leaves your sight for too long, your shadow will dissipate.

value.name: Shadow Veil

You veil yourself in shadows for 4, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns, and let them control you.

While veiled, you become immune to status effects and gain 17%, 24%, 30%, 35%, 40% all damage reduction. Each turn, you blink to a nearby foe (within range 5, 5, 6, 7, 7), hitting it for 146%, 169%, 187%, 202%, 215% darkness weapon damage.

The shadow cannot teleport.

While this goes on, you cannot be stopped unless you are killed, and you cannot control your character.

value.info_text:

For 7, 10, 12, 15, 18 turns, they will try to come to you, even pushing others aside to do so. They will move towards you instead of acting 27%, 37%, 44%, 50%, 55% of the time, but can save verses Mindpower to slow the effect. The Spellpower and Mindpower reduction increases with your Willpower.

value.name: Instill Fear

You gain 2 new fears: The Paranoid effect gives the target an 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 60% chance to physically attack a nearby creature, friend or foe. If hit, their target will be afflicted with Paranoia as well. The Despair effect reduces the target's resistance to all damage by 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52%.

Fear effects improve with your Mindpower.

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with a shield that will absorb 24%, 38%, 48%, 55%, 61% of any physical/acid/nature/temporal attack, up to a maximum of 65, 89, 107, 122, 136 damage per attack.

Every time your shield absorbs damage, you convert some of the attack into energy, gaining one point of Psi, plus an additional point for every 68, 57, 48, 40, 34 points of damage absorbed, up to a maximum 2.4, 2.6, 2.9, 3.0, 3.2 points each turn.

At talent level 3, when you de-activate the shield twice the absorbed damage (if any) in the last 3 turns is released as a full psionic shield (absorbing all damage).

The maximum amount of damage your shield can absorb and the efficiency of the psi gain scale with your mindpower.

You can only have two of these shields active at once.

value.info_text:
Focus kinetic energy and strike an enemy for 126%, 158%, 182%, 202%, 221% weapon damage as physical.

They will be pinned to the ground for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns by the force of this attack.

Any frozen creature hit by this attack will take an extra 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 physical damage.

The extra damage will scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Thermal Strike
value.info_text:
Focus thermal energy and strike an enemy for 126%, 158%, 182%, 202%, 221% weapon damage as cold.

A burst of cold will then engulf them, doing an extra 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 Cold damage and also freeze them for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

If the attack freezes a pinned creature a burst of ice is summoned, circling the caster and the creature with a wall of ice for 3 turns.

The cold burst damage will scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Charged Strike
value.info_text:
Focus charged energy and strike an enemy for 126%, 158%, 182%, 202%, 221% weapon damage as lightning.

Energy will then discharge from your weapon, doing an extra 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 lightning damage and halving their stun/daze/freeze/pin resistance for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

If Charged Shield is sustained and the target pinned it will increase the absorbed value by 203, 275, 330, 378, 420.

If the target frozen the ice will melt in a flash of vapour, knocking back all creatures around it in radius 2.

The discharge damage will scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Transcendent Electrokinesis
value.info_text:
For 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns your electrokinesis transcends your normal limits, increasing your Lightning damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and your Lightning resistance penetration by 12%, 16%, 19%, 21%, 23%.

In addition:

The cooldowns of Charged Shield, Charged Leech, Charged Aura, Charged Strike and Brainstorm are reset.

Charged Aura effects will have their radius increased by 1.

Your Charged Shield will have 100% absorption efficiency and will absorb twice the normal amount of damage.

Brainstorm will also inflict blindness.

Charge Leech will also inflict confusion (18%, 27%, 32%, 35%, 37% effect).

Charged Strike will have its secondary lightning burst chain to up to 3 targets in a radius of 3.

The damage bonus and resistance penetration scale with your Mindpower.

Only one Transcendent talent may be in effect at a time.

value2.name: Transcendent Electrokinesis
value2.info_text:

In addition:

The cooldowns of Charged Shield, Charged Leech, Charged Aura and Brainstorm are reset.

Charged Aura will either increase in radius to 2, or apply its damage bonus to all of your weapons, whichever is applicable.

Your Charged Shield will have 100% absorption efficiency and will absorb twice the normal amount of damage.

Brainstorm will also inflict blindness.

Charge Leech will also inflict confusion (18%, 27%, 32%, 35%, 37% effect).

Charged Strike will have its secondary lightning/blind burst chain to up to 3 targets in a radius of 3.

The damage bonus and resistance penetration scale with your Mindpower.

Only one Transcendent talent may be in effect at a time.

This reveals their location and boosts your defense by 25, 34, 41, 47, 52.

The defense scales with you Mindpower and the range with your Willpower.

These effects scale with your Mindpower.

The negative health limit scales with your Mindpower and maxium life.

value.name: Mind Storm
value.info_text:
Unleash your subconscious on the world around you. While active, you fire up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 bolts each turn (one per hostile target) that deal 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 mind damage. Each bolt consumes 5 Feedback.

Feedback gains beyond your maximum allowed amount may generate extra bolts (one bolt per 18, 16, 15, 14, 14 excess Feedback per target), but no more then 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 extra bolts per turn.

This effect is a psionic channel, and will break if you move.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.

value.info_text:
Fire a bolt of distortion that ignores resistance and inflicts 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 physical damage. This damage will distort affected targets, decreasing physical resistance by 0% and rendering them vulnerable to distortion effects for two turns.

If the bolt comes in contact with a target that's already distorted, a detonation will occur, inflicting 150% of the base damage in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 3.

Investing in this talent will increase the physical resistance reduction from all of your distortion effects.

At talent level 5, you learn to shape your distortion effects, preventing them from hitting you or your allies.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Forge Shield
value.info_text:
When an attack would deal 15% or more of your effective total health, you forge the Dream Shield to protect yourself, reducing the damage of all attacks of that type by 19, 25, 31, 35, 39 for the next 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 turn(s).

You may block multiple damage types at one time, but the base damage threshold increases by 15% per damage type the shield is already blocking.

If you block all of an attack's damage, the attacker will be vulnerable to a deadly counterstrike (a normal melee or ranged attack will instead deal 200% damage) for one turn.

At talent level 5, the block effect will last two turns.

This damage reduction scales with your Mindpower.

Broken Dreams has a 6%, 14%, 20%, 25%, 30% chance to brainlock your enemies.

The damage and dream breaking effect will scale with your Mindpower.

At talent level 5, you'll bring a second random talent off cooldown.

The base power, Accuracy, Armour penetration, and critical strike chance of the weapon will scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Hammer Toss
value.info_text:
Throw your Dream Hammer at a distant location, inflicting 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage on all targets between you and it. After reaching its destination, the Dream Hammer will return, potentially hitting targets a second time.

Learning this talent increases the Accuracy of your Dream Hammer by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65.

value2.info_text:

value.info_text:
Crush your enemy with your Dream Hammer, inflicting 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage. If the attack hits, the target is stunned for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Stun chance improves with your Mindpower. Learning this talent increases your Physical Power for Dream Hammer damage calculations by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and all damage with Dream Hammer attacks by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57%.
value.name: Dream Crusher

value.name: Forge Echoes
value.info_text:
Strike the target with a mighty blow from the forge, inflicting 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage. If the attack hits, the echo of the attack will lash out at all enemies in a 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 radius.

Learning this talent adds 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 mind damage and 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 burning damage to your Dream Hammer strikes.

The mind and fire damage will scale with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Forge Echoes
value2.info_text:

value.name: Sleep
value.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 to sleep for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Sleep ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

At talent level 5 Sleep will become contagious and has a 25% chance to spread to nearby targets each turn.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Sleep
value2.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 to sleep for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Sleep ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

At talent level 5 Sleep will become contagious and has a 25% chance to spread to nearby targets each turn.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Lucid Dreamer
value.info_text:
Slip into a lucid dream. While in this state, you are considered sleeping, but can still act, are immune to insomnia, inflict 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%, 32% more damage to targets under the effects of Insomnia, and your Physical, Mental, and Spell saves are increased by 15, 21, 25, 28, 32.

Note that being asleep may make you more vulnerable to certain effects (such as Inner Demons, Night Terror, and Waking Nightmare).

The saving throw bonuses scale with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Lucid Dreamer
value2.info_text:
Slip into a lucid dream. While in this state, you are considered sleeping, but can still act, are immune to insomnia, inflict 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%, 32% more damage to targets under the effects of Insomnia, and your Physical, Mental, and Spell saves are increased by 15, 21, 25, 28, 32.

Note that being asleep may make you more vulnerable to certain effects (such as Inner Demons, Night Terror, and Waking Nightmare).

The saving throw bonuses scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Dream Walk
value.info_text: You move through the dream world, reappearing near the target location (6, 5, 4, 2, 1 teleport accuracy). If the target is a sleeping creature, you'll instead appear as close to them as possible.

value2.name: Dream Walk
value2.info_text: You move through the dream world, reappearing near the target location (6, 5, 4, 2, 1 teleport accuracy). If the target is a sleeping creature, you'll instead appear as close to them as possible.

value.name: Dream Prison
value.info_text:
Imprisons all sleeping targets within range in their dream state, effectively extending sleeping effects for as long as Dream Prison is maintainted.

This powerful effect constantly drains 4.35%, 3.70%, 3.05%, 2.40%, 1.75% of your maximum Psi per turn, and is considered a psionic channel; as such it will break if you move.

(Note that sleeping effects that happen each turn, such as Nightmare's damage and Sleep's contagion, will cease to function for the duration of the effect.)

value2.name: Dream Prison
value2.info_text:

value.name: Resonance Field
value.info_text:
Activate to create a resonance field that will absorb 50% of all damage you take (328, 445, 535, 612, 680 max absorption). The field will not interfere with Feedback gain.

The max absorption value will scale with your Mindpower, and the effect lasts up to ten turns.

value2.name: Resonance Field
value2.info_text:

value.name: Conversion
value.info_text:
Use Feedback to replenish yourself. This heals you for 319, 432, 520, 595, 661 life, and restores 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 stamina, 57, 77, 93, 107, 119 mana, 47, 64, 78, 89, 99 equilibrium, 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 vim, 15, 21, 26, 29, 33 positive and negative energies, 22, 30, 36, 41, 46 psi energy, and 7, 10, 13, 14, 16 hate.

The heal and resource gain will improve with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Conversion
value2.info_text:

The heal and resource gain will improve with your Mindpower.

value.name: Realign
value.info_text:
Realign and readjust your body with the power of your mind, curing up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 detrimental physical effects and healing you for 238, 309, 364, 410, 451 life.

The life healed increases with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Realign
value2.info_text:

value.name: Reshape Weapon/Armour
value.info_text:
Manipulate forces on the molecular level to realign, rebalance, and hone a weapon, set of body armor, or a shield. (Mindstars resist being adjusted because they are already in an ideal natural state.)

This permanently increases the Accuracy and damage of any weapon by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25 or increases the armour rating of any piece of Armour by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25, while reducing its fatigue rating by 5, 8, 9, 11, 12.

The effects increase with your Mindpower and multiple uses on an item only increase the effect if your skill has improved.

These bonusses are automatically updated on equipped items when you level up.

value2.name: Reshape Weapon/Armour
value2.info_text:
Manipulate forces on the molecular level to realign, rebalance, and hone a weapon, set of body armor, or a shield. (Mindstars resist being adjusted because they are already in an ideal natural state.)

This permanently increases the Accuracy and damage of any weapon by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25 or increases the armour rating of any piece of Armour by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25, while reducing its fatigue rating by 5, 8, 9, 11, 12.

The effects increase with your Mindpower and can only be applied (or reapplied) once to any item.

value.name: Matter is Energy
value.info_text:
Matter is energy, as any good Mindslayer knows. Unfortunately, the various bonds and particles involved are just too numerous and complex to make the conversion feasible in most cases. The ordered, crystalline structure of a gem, however, make it possible to transform a small percentage of its matter into usable energy.

This talent consumes one gem and grants 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 energy per turn for between 5 and 13 turns, depending on the quality of the gem used.

This process also creates a resonance field that provides the (imbued) effects of the gem to you while this effect lasts.

value2.name: Matter is Energy
value2.info_text:
Matter is energy, as any good Mindslayer knows. Unfortunately, the various bonds and particles involved are just too numerous and complex to make the conversion feasible in most cases. The ordered, crystalline structure of a gem, however, make it possible to transform a small percentage of its matter into usable energy.

This talent consumes one gem and grants 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 energy per turn for between 5 and 13 turns, depending on the quality of the gem used.

This process also creates a resonance field that provides the (imbued) effects of the gem to you while this effect lasts.

value.info_text:
By carefully synchronizing your mind to the resonant frequencies of your psionic focus, you strengthen its effects.

For conventional weapons, this increases the percentage of your willpower and cunning that is used in place of strength and dexterity, from 60% to 73%, 84%, 93%, 101%, 107%.

For mindstars, this increases the chance to pull enemies to you by +13%, +24%, +33%, +41%, +47%.

For gems, this increases the bonus stats by 3, 5, 7, 9, 10.
value.name: Resonant Focus

value.name: Mindlash

Focus energies into a beam to lash all creatures in a line with physical force, doing 163, 221, 266, 304, 338 Physical damage and knocking them off balance for 2 turns (-15% global speed).

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.

Mentally focus electricity into a ball of plasma and hurl it at the target.

The plasma will explode on impact, dealing 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 Lightning damage within radius 2, 2, 2, 3, 3.

This talent will apply cross tier Brainlock.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.

value.info_text:
Summon a storm of swirling blades to slice your foes, inflicting 55, 75, 90, 103, 114 physical damage and bleeding to anyone who approaches for 8, 8, 9, 9, 9 turns.

The damage and duration will increase with your Mindpower.

value2.info_text:

value.name: Transcendent Telekinesis
value.info_text:
For 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns your telekinesis transcends your normal limits, increasing your Physical damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and you Physical resistance penetration by 12%, 16%, 19%, 21%, 23%.

In addition:

The cooldowns of Kinetic Shield, Kinetic Leech, Kinetic Aura, Kinetic Strike and Mindlash are reset.

Kinetic Aura effects will have their radius increased by 1.

Your Kinetic Shield will have 100% absorption efficiency and will absorb twice the normal amount of damage.

Mindlash will also inflict stun.

Kinetic Leech will put enemies to sleep.

Kinetic Strike will hit 2 adjacent enemies in a sweeping attack.

The damage bonus and resistance penetration scale with your Mindpower.

Only one Transcendent talent may be in effect at a time.

value2.name: Transcendent Telekinesis
value2.info_text:

In addition:

The cooldowns of Kinetic Shield, Kinetic Leech, Kinetic Aura and Mindlash are reset.

Kinetic Aura will either increase in radius to 2, or apply its damage bonus to all of your weapons, whichever is applicable.

Your Kinetic Shield will have 100% absorption efficiency and will absorb twice the normal amount of damage.

Mindlash will also inflict stun.

Kinetic Leech will put enemies to sleep.

Kinetic Strike will hit 2 adjacent enemies in a sweeping attack.

The damage bonus and resistance penetration scale with your Mindpower.

Only one Transcendent talent may be in effect at a time.

value.name: Kinetic Surge
value.info_text:
Build telekinetic power and dump it onto an adjacent creature or yourself.

This will launch them to where ever you target in a radius of 6, 8, 8, 9, 9.

Upon landing, launched enemy takes 121, 164, 197, 225, 250 Physical damage and is stunned for 3, 4, 4, 4, 4 turns.

All other creatures within radius 2 of the landing point take 61, 82, 99, 113, 125 Physical damage and are knocked away from you.

This talent ignores 26%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% of the knockback resistance of the thrown target, which takes half damage if it resists being thrown.

When used on yourself, you will launch in a straight line, knocking enemies flying and doing 121, 164, 197, 225, 250 Physical damage to each.

You can break through 3, 4, 4, 4, 4 walls while doing this.

The damage improves with your Mindpower and the range increases with Mindpower.

value2.name: Kinetic Surge
value2.info_text:

This will launch them to where ever you target in a radius of 6, 8, 8, 9, 9.

You can break through 3, 4, 4, 4, 4 walls while doing this.

The damage improves with your Mindpower and the range increases with both Mindpower and Strength.

value.name: Deflect Projectiles
value.info_text:
You learn to devote a portion of your attention to mentally swatting, grabbing, or otherwise deflecting incoming projectiles.

All projectiles targeting you have a 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 45% chance to instead target another spot within radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 and move 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 45% slower.

If you choose, you can use your mind to grab all projectiles within radius 10 of you and hurl them toward any location within range 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 of you, but this will break your concentration.

To do this, deactivate this sustained talent.

value2.name: Deflect Projectiles
value2.info_text:

All projectiles targeting you have a 20%, 31%, 39%, 45%, 51% chance to instead target another spot within radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

To do this, deactivate this sustained talent.

value.name: Implode
value.info_text:
Bind the target mercilessly with constant, bone-shattering pressure, pinning and slowing it by 50% for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns and dealing 87, 118, 142, 163, 181 Physical damage each turn.

The duration and damage will improve with your Mindpower.
