value.name: Projection
value.info_text:
Activate to project your mind from your body for 6, 9, 12, 14, 16 turns. In this state you're invisible (+13, +17, +21, +24, +26 power), can see invisible and stealthed creatures (+26, +35, +42, +48, +53 detection power), can move through walls, and do not need air to survive.

All damage you suffer is shared with your physical body, and while in this form you may only deal damage to 'ghosts' or through an active mind link (mind damage only in the second case.)

To return to your body, simply release control of the projection.

value.name: Mind Link
value.info_text:
Link minds with the target. While your minds are linked, you'll inflict 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% more mind damage to the target and gain telepathy for its creature type.

Only one mindlink can be maintained at a time, and the effect will break if the target dies or goes beyond range (14)).

The mind damage bonus will scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Nightmare
value.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius 7 cone into a nightmarish sleep for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

Each turn, they'll suffer 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage. This damage will not reduce the duration of the effect.

When Nightmare ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold and mind damage will scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Inner Demons
value.info_text:
Brings the target's inner demons to the surface. Each turn, for 4, 7, 10, 12, 14 turns, there's a 19%, 24%, 27%, 30%, 32% chance that a demon will surface, requiring the target to make a Mental Save to keep it from manifesting.

If the target is sleeping, the chance to save will be halved, and fear immunity will be ignored. Otherwise, if the summoning is resisted, the effect will end early.

The summon chance will scale with your Mindpower and the demon's life will scale with the target's rank.

If the target is sleeping, the chance of avoiding a negative effect will be halved and fear immunity will be ignored.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Telekinetic Grasp
value.info_text: Encase a weapon or gem in mentally-controlled forces, holding it aloft and bringing it to bear with the power of your mind alone.

value2.name: Telekinetic Grasp

value.info_text:

A gem will provide +3 bonus to all primary stats per tier of the gem.

A mindstar will randomly try to telekinetically grab a far away foe (10% chance and range 2 for a tier 1 mindstar, +1 range and +5% chance for each tier above 1) and pull it into melee range.

A physical melee weapon will act as a semi independant entity, attacking foes nearby each turn while also replacing Strength and Dexterity with Willpower and Cunning for accuracy and damage calculations. This stat usage modification will also apply to conventionally wielded weapons.

value.name: Thought-Form: Bowman
value.info_text:
Forge a bowman, clad in leather armor, from your thoughts. The bowman learns Bow Mastery, Combat Accuracy, Steady Shot, Crippling Shot, and Rapid Shot as it levels up, and has +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Strength, +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Dexterity, and +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Constitution.

Activating this talent will put all other thought-forms on cooldown.

The stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Thought-Form: Bowman
value2.info_text:
Forge a bowman, clad in leather armor, from your thoughts. The bowman learns Bow Mastery, Combat Accuracy, Steady Shot, Crippling Shot, and Rapid Shot as it levels up, and has +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Strength, +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Dexterity, and +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Constitution.

Activating this talent will put all other thought-forms on cooldown.

The stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.

value.name: Thought-Form: Warrior
value.info_text:
Forge a warrior wielding a battle-axe from your thoughts. The warrior learns Weapon Mastery, Combat Accuracy, Berserker, Death Dance, and Rush as it levels up, and has +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Strength, +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Dexterity, and +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Constitution.

Activating this talent will put all other thought-forms on cooldown.

The stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Thought-Form: Warrior
value2.info_text:
Forge a warrior wielding a battle-axe from your thoughts. The warrior learns Weapon Mastery, Combat Accuracy, Berserker, Death Dance, and Rush as it levels up, and has +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Strength, +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Dexterity, and +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Constitution.

Activating this talent will put all other thought-forms on cooldown.

The stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.

value.name: Thought-Form: Defender
value.info_text:
Forge a defender wielding a sword and shield from your thoughts. The solider learns Armor Training, Weapon Mastery, Combat Accuracy, Shield Pummel, and Shield Wall as it levels up, and has +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Strength, +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Dexterity, and +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Constitution.

Activating this talent will put all other thought-forms on cooldown.

The stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Thought-Form: Defender
value2.info_text:
Forge a defender wielding a sword and shield from your thoughts. The solider learns Armor Rraining, Weapon Mastery, Combat Accuracy, Shield Pummel, and Shield Wall as it levels up, and has +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Strength, +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Dexterity, and +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Constitution.

Activating this talent will put all other thought-forms on cooldown.

The stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.

value.info_text:
Fills the air around you with reactive currents of force.

If you have a gem or mindstar in your psionically wielded slot, this will do 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Physical damage to all who approach, costing 0.5 energy per creature.

If you have a conventional weapon in your psionically wielded slot, this will add 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Physical damage to all your weapon hits, costing 0.5 energy per hit.

When deactivated, if you have at least 6 energy, a massive spike of kinetic energy is released as a range 6 beam, smashing targets for up to 253, 343, 413, 472, 524 physical damage and sending them flying.

Activating the aura takes no time but de-activating it does.

To turn off an aura without spiking it, deactivate it and target yourself. The damage will improve with your Mindpower.

You can only have two of these auras active at once.
value.name: Kinetic Aura

value2.info_text:
Fills the air around you with reactive currents of force.

If you have a gem or mindstar in your psionically wielded slot, this will do 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Physical damage to all who approach.

All damage done by the aura will drain one point of energy per 10, 12, 13, 14, 16 points of damage dealt.

If you have a conventional weapon in your psionically wielded slot, this will add 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Physical damage to its hits.

When deactivated, if you have at least 6 energy, a massive spike of kinetic energy is released as a range 6 beam, smashing targets for up to 253, 343, 413, 472, 524 physical damage and sending them flying.

Activating the aura takes no time but de-activating it does.

To turn off an aura without spiking it, deactivate it and target yourself. The damage will improve with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Kinetic Aura

value.info_text:
Fills the air around you with reactive currents of furnace-like heat.

If you have a gem or mindstar in your psionically wielded slot, this will do 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Fire damage to all who approach, costing 0.5 energy per creature.

If you have a conventional weapon in your psionically wielded slot, this will add 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Fire damage to all your weapon hits, costing 0.5 energy per hit.

When deactivated, if you have at least 6 energy, a massive spike of thermal energy is released as a conical blast (radius 6) of superheated air. Anybody caught in it will suffer up to 253, 343, 413, 472, 524 fire damage over several turns.

Activating the aura takes no time but de-activating it does.

To turn off an aura without spiking it, deactivate it and target yourself. The damage will improve with your Mindpower.

You can only have two of these auras active at once.
value.name: Thermal Aura

value2.info_text:
Fills the air around you with reactive currents of furnace-like heat.

If you have a gem or mindstar in your psionically wielded slot, this will do 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Fire damage to all who approach.

All damage done by the aura will drain one point of energy per 10, 12, 13, 14, 16 points of damage dealt.

If you have a conventional weapon in your psionically wielded slot, this will add 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Fire damage to its hits.

When deactivated, if you have at least 6 energy, a massive spike of thermal energy is released as a conical blast (radius 6) of superheated air. Anybody caught in it will suffer up to 253, 343, 413, 472, 524 fire damage over several turns.

Activating the aura takes no time but de-activating it does.

To turn off an aura without spiking it, deactivate it and target yourself. The damage will improve with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Thermal Aura

value.info_text:
Fills the air around you with crackling energy.

If you have a gem or mindstar in your psionically wielded slot, this will do 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Lightning damage to all who approach, costing 0.5 energy per creature.

If you have a conventional weapon in your psionically wielded slot, this will add 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Lightning damage to all your weapon hits, costing 0.5 energy per hit.

When deactivated, if you have at least 6 energy, a massive spike of electrical energy jumps between up to 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 nearby targets, doing up to 253, 343, 413, 472, 525 Lightning damage to each with a 50% chance of dazing them.

Activating the aura takes no time but de-activating it does.

To turn off an aura without spiking it, deactivate it and target yourself.

You can only have two of these auras active at once.
value.name: Charged Aura

value2.name: Charged Aura
value2.info_text:
Fills the air around you with crackling energy.

If you have a gem or mindstar in your psionically wielded slot, this will do 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Lightning damage to all who approach.

All damage done by the aura will drain one point of energy per 10, 12, 13, 14, 16 points of damage dealt.

If you have a conventional weapon in your psionically wielded slot, this will add 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Lightning damage to its hits.

When deactivated, if you have at least 6 energy, a massive spike of electrical energy jumps between up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 4 nearby targets, doing up to 253, 343, 413, 472, 525 Lightning damage to each with a 50% chance of dazing them.

Activating the aura takes no time but de-activating it does.

To turn off an aura without spiking it, deactivate it and target yourself.

value.name: Frenzied Focus
value.info_text:
Overcharge your psionic focus with energy for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns, producing a different effect depending on what it is.

A telekinetically wielded weapon enters a frenzy, striking up to 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 times every turn, also increases the radius by 2, 3, 3, 4, 4.

A mindstar will attempt to pull in all enemies within its normal range.

A gem will fire an energy bolt at a random enemy in range 6, each turn for 135, 183, 220, 251, 279 damage. The type is determined by the colour of the gem. Damage scales with Mindpower.

value2.name: Frenzied Focus
value2.info_text:
Overcharge your psionic focus with energy for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns, producing a different effect depending on what it is.

A telekinetically wielded weapon enters a frenzy, striking up to 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 times every turn, also increases the radius by 2, 3, 3, 4, 4.

A mindstar or a gem will fire an energy bolt at a random enemy in range 6, each turn for 135, 183, 220, 251, 279 damage. The type is determined by the colour of the gem or mindstar base damage. Damage scales with Mindpower. The mindstar will stop its normal attacks.

value.info_text:
Gather your will, and brutally smash the target with your mainhand weapon and then your telekinetically wielded weapon, doing 120%, 133%, 142%, 151%, 158% weapon damage.

If your mainhand weapon hits, you will also stun the target for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

This attack uses your Willpower and Cunning instead of Strength and Dexterity to determine Accuracy and damage.

Any active Aura damage bonusses will extend to the weapons used for this attack.
value.name: Telekinetic Smash

value2.name: Telekinetic Smash
value2.info_text:
Gather your will, and brutally smash the target with your mainhand weapon and then your telekinetically wielded weapon, doing 120%, 133%, 142%, 151%, 158% weapon damage.

If your mainhand weapon hits, you will also stun the target for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

This attack uses your Willpower and Cunning instead of Strength and Dexterity to determine Accuracy and damage.

Any active Aura damage bonusses will extend to the weapons used for this attack.

value.name: Augmentation
value.info_text:
While active, you give your flesh and blood body a boost in the form of precisely applied mental forces. Increases Strength and Dexterity by 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35% of your Willpower and Cunning, respectively.

Strength increased by 12, 19, 25, 30, 35

Dexterity increased by 12, 19, 25, 30, 35

value2.info_text:
While active, you give your flesh and blood body a boost in the form of precisely applied mental forces. Increases Strength and Dexterity by 9%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 29% of your Willpower and Cunning, respectively.

Strength increased by 9, 15, 21, 25, 29

Dexterity increased by 9, 15, 21, 25, 29
value2.name: Augmentation

value.name: Warding Weapon
value.info_text:
Assume a defensive mental state.

For one turn, you will fully block the next melee attack used against you with your telekinetically-wielded weapon and then strike the attacker with it for 92%, 100%, 105%, 110%, 114% weapon damage.

At raw talent level 3 you will also disarm the attacker for 3 turns.

At raw talent level 5 you will be able to reflexively block up to one attack per turn with a 5%, 10%, 18%, 24%, 30% chance, based on your cunning. Each trigger requires and uses 10 Psi.

This requires a telekinetically-wielded weapon.

value2.name: Warding Weapon
value2.info_text:
Assume a defensive mental state.

For one turn, you will fully block the next melee attack used against you with your telekinetically-wielded weapon and then strike the attacker with it for 92%, 100%, 105%, 110%, 114% weapon damage.

At raw talent level 3 you will also disarm the attacker for 3 turns.

At raw talent level 5 you will be able to reflexively block up to one attack per turn with a 5%, 10%, 18%, 24%, 30% chance, based on your cunning. Each trigger requires and uses 15 Psi.

This requires a telekinetically-wielded weapon.

value.name: Impale
value.info_text:
Focus your will into a powerful thrust of your telekinetically-wielded weapon to impale your target and then viciously rip it free.

This deals 206%, 229%, 247%, 262%, 275% weapon damage and then causes the victim to bleed for 234, 317, 382, 437, 485 Physical damage over four turns.

At level 3 the thrust is so powerful that it has 34%, 70%, 80%, 85%, 88% chance to shatter a temporary damage shield if one exists.

The bleeding damage increases with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Impale
value2.info_text:
Focus your will into a powerful thrust of your telekinetically-wielded weapon to impale your target and then viciously rip it free.

This deals 206%, 229%, 247%, 262%, 275% weapon damage and then causes the victim to bleed for 234, 317, 382, 437, 485 Physical damage over four turns.

At level 3 the thrust is so powerful that it has 34%, 70%, 80%, 85%, 88% chance to shatter a temporary damage shield if one exists.

Your Willpower and Cunning are used instead of Strength and Dexterity to determine Accuracy and damage.

The bleeding damage increases with your Mindpower.

value.info_text:
Sends a telepathic attack, trying to destroy the brains of any target in the beam, doing 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 mind damage.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
value.name: Mind Sear

value2.info_text:
Sends a telepathic attack, trying to destroy the brains of any target in the beam, doing 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 mind damage.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Mind Sear

value.name: Psychic Lobotomy
value.info_text:
Inflicts 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 mind damage and cripples the target's higher mental functions, reducing cunning by 15, 21, 26, 29, 33 and confusing (33%, 36%, 38%, 39%, 40% power) the target for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The damage, cunning penalty, and confusion power will scale with your Mindpower.

The damage, cunning penalty, and confusion power will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Psychic Lobotomy

value.name: Synaptic Static
value.info_text:
Sends out a blast of telepathic static in a 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 radius, inflicting 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 mind damage. This attack can brainlock affected targets.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.

value2.info_text:
Sends out a blast of telepathic static in a 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 radius, inflicting 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 mind damage. This attack can brainlock affected targets.

value2.name: Synaptic Static

value.name: Sunder Mind
value.info_text:
Cripples the target's mind, inflicting 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 mind damage and reducing its Mental Save by 10, 13, 16, 18, 20 for 4 turns. This attack always hits, and the mental save reduction stacks.

Against brainlocked targets, the damage and Mental Save reduction will be doubled.

The damage and save reduction will scale with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Sunder Mind
value2.info_text:
Cripples the target's mind, inflicting 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 mind damage and reducing its Mental Save by 10, 13, 16, 18, 20 for 4 turns. This attack always hits, and the mental save reduction stacks.

Against brainlocked targets, the damage and Mental Save reduction will be doubled.

The damage and save reduction will scale with your Mindpower.

value.info_text:
Puts the target into a deep sleep for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns, rendering it unable to act. Every 66, 90, 108, 123, 137 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Slumber ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Slumber

value2.name: Slumber
value2.info_text:
Puts the target into a deep sleep for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns, rendering it unable to act. Every 66, 90, 108, 123, 137 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Slumber ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Dreamscape
value.info_text:
Enter a sleeping target's dreams for 7, 10, 12, 14, 15 turns. While in the Dreamscape, you'll encounter the target's invulnerable sleeping form as well as dream projections that it will spawn every other turn to defend its mind.

Projections inflict 50% less damage than the original, unless the target has Lucid Dreamer active.

When the Dreamscape ends, for each projection destroyed, the target's life will be reduced by 10% and it will be brainlocked for one turn.

In the Dreamscape, your damage will be improved by 65%, 89%, 107%, 122%, 136%.

The damage bonus will improve with your Mindpower.

value2.info_text:
Enter a sleeping target's dreams for 7, 10, 12, 14, 15 turns. While in the Dreamscape, you'll encounter the target's invulnerable sleeping form as well as dream projections that it will spawn every other turn to defend its mind.

Projections inflict 50% less damage then the original, unless the target has Lucid Dreamer active.

When the Dreamscape ends, for each projection destroyed, the target's life will be reduced by 10% and it will be brainlocked for one turn.

In the Dreamscape, your damage will be improved by 65%, 89%, 107%, 122%, 136%.

value2.name: Dreamscape

value.info_text:
For 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns your pyrokinesis transcends your normal limits, increasing your Fire and Cold damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and your Fire and Cold resistance penetration by 12%, 16%, 19%, 21%, 23%.

In addition:

The cooldowns of Thermal Shield, Thermal Leech, Thermal Aura, Thermal Strike and Pyrokinesis are reset.

Thermal Aura effects will have their radius increased by 1.

Your Thermal Shield will have 100% absorption efficiency and will absorb twice the normal amount of damage.

Pyrokinesis will inflict Flameshock.

Thermal Leech will reduce enemy damage by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%.

Thermal Strike will have its secondary cold/freeze explode in radius 1.

The damage bonus and resistance penetration scale with your Mindpower.

Only one Transcendent talent may be in effect at a time.
value.name: Transcendent Pyrokinesis

value2.name: Transcendent Pyrokinesis
value2.info_text:
For 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns your pyrokinesis transcends your normal limits, increasing your Fire and Cold damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and your Fire and Cold resistance penetration by 12%, 16%, 19%, 21%, 23%.

In addition:

The cooldowns of Thermal Shield, Thermal Leech, Thermal Aura and Pyrokinesis are reset.

Thermal Aura will either increase in radius to 2, or apply its damage bonus to all of your weapons, whichever is applicable.

Your Thermal Shield will have 100% absorption efficiency and will absorb twice the normal amount of damage.

Pyrokinesis will inflict Flameshock.

Thermal Leech will reduce enemy damage by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%.

Thermal Strike will have its secondary cold/freeze explode in radius 1.

The damage bonus and resistance penetration scale with your Mindpower.

Only one Transcendent talent may be in effect at a time.

value.name: Brainfreeze
value.info_text:
Quickly drain the heat from your target's brain, dealing 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 Cold damage.

Affected creatures will also be brainlocked for 4 turns, putting a random talent on cooldown, and freezing cooldowns.

The damage and chance to brainlock increase with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Brainfreeze
value2.info_text:
Quickly drain the heat from your target's brain, dealing 235, 318, 383, 437, 486 Cold damage.

Affected creatures will also be brainlocked for 4 turns, putting a random talent on cooldown, and freezing cooldowns.

The damage and chance to brainlock increase with your Mindpower.

value.name: Heat Shift
value.info_text:
Within radius 2, 2, 3, 4, 4, transfer heat from a group of enemies bodies to their equipment, freezing them to the floor while the excess heat disables their weapons and armor.

Those afflicted will be dealt 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 Cold and 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 Fire damage, and be pinned (Frozen Feet) and disarmed for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Targets suffering both types of damage will also have have their Armour and saves reduced by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25.

The chance to apply the effects and the duration increase with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Heat Shift
value2.info_text:
Within radius 2, 2, 3, 4, 4, transfer heat from a group of enemies bodies to their equipment, freezing them to the floor while the excess heat disables their weapons and armor.

Those afflicted will be dealt 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 Cold and 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 Fire damage, and be pinned (Frozen Feet) and disarmed for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Targets suffering both types of damage will also have have their Armour and saves reduced by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25.

The chance to apply the effects and the duration increase with your Mindpower.

value.name: Thermal Balance
value.info_text:
You seek balance between fire and cold based on your current Psi level.

You blast your foes with 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 Fire damage based on your current Psi, 50, 68, 82, 93, 104 Cold damage based on your max Psi minus your current Psi, in a radius 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 ball.

This sets your current Psi to half of your maximum Psi.

The damage scales with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Thermal Balance
value2.info_text:
You seek balance between fire and cold based on your current Psi level.

You blast your foes with 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 Fire damage based on your current Psi, 50, 68, 82, 93, 104 Cold damage based on your max Psi minus your current Psi, in a radius 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 ball.

This sets your current Psi to half of your maximum Psi.

The damage scales with your Mindpower.

value.info_text:
Take direct control of your active thought-form, improving its damage, attack speed, and maximum life by 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66%, but leaving your body a defenseless shell.

At talent level 1, any Feedback your Thought-Forms gain will be given to you as well. At level 3, your Thought-Forms gain a bonus to all saves equal to your Mental Save. At level 5, they gain a bonus to all damage equal to your bonus mind damage.

The secondary bonuses apply whether or not this talent is currently active.

The life, damage, and speed bonus will improve with your Mindpower.
value.name: Over Mind

value2.info_text:
Take direct control of your active thought-form, improving its damage, attack speed, and maximum life by 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66%, but leaving your body a defenseless shell.

value.name: Kinetic Leech
value.info_text:
You draw kinetic energy from your surroundings to replenish your Psi.

This will slow all targets within radius 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 by 16%, 17%, 18%, 20%, 21% (max 17%, 18%, 20%, 22%, 23%) for four turns, draining 29, 39, 47, 53, 59 (max 43, 58, 70, 80, 89) stamina from each.

You replenish 11, 14, 17, 20, 22 (max 16, 22, 26, 30, 33) Psi from the first target, with each additional target restoring 20% less than the one before it.

The strength of these effects increases as your Psi depletes and with your Mindpower.

You replenish 11, 14, 17, 20, 22 (max 16, 22, 26, 30, 33) Psi from the first target, with each additional target restoring 20% less than the one before it.

The damage and the strength of these effects increases as your Psi depletes and with your Mindpower.

value.name: Stone Walking
value.info_text:
While the origins of the dwarves remain clouded in mysteries to the other races, it is obvious they share strong ties to the stone.

You can target any wall and immediately enter it and appear on the other side of the obstacle.

Works up to 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 grids away (increases with Constitution and talent level).

value2.info_text:
While the origins of the dwarves remain clouded in mysteries to the other races, it is obvious they share strong ties to the stone.

You can target any wall and immediately enter it and appear on the other side of the obstacle.

Works up to 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 grids away (increases with Constitution and talent level).
value2.name: Stone Walking

value.info_text:
You enter an ogric wrath for 5, 6, 9, 10, 12 turns, increasing your stun and pinning resistances by 20% and all damage done by 10%.

In addition, whenever you miss a melee attack or any damage you deal is reduced by a damage shield or similar effect you gain a charge of Ogre Fury(up to 5 charges, each lasts 7 turns).

Each charge grants 20% critical damage power and 5% critical strike chance.

You loose a charge each time you deal a critical strike.

The duration will increase with your Strength.
value.name: Ogric Wrath

value.info_text:
An ogre's body is used to spells and inscriptions.

Increases spell save by 6, 11, 16, 20, 24 and improves the contribution of primary stats on infusions and runes by 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 46%.

At level 5 your body is so strong you can use a two handed weapon in your main hand while still using an offhand item.

When using a two handed weapon this way you suffer a 20% hit chance pernalty, decreasing by 5% per size category above big.
value.name: Grisly Constitution

value.info_text:
When you crit you have 22%, 32%, 39%, 45%, 50% chances to reduce the remaining cooldown of one of your inscriptions and of any saturations effects.

This effect can only happen once per turn.
value.name: Scar-Scripted Flesh
Writ Large
value.info_text:
Instantly removes runic and infusion saturations.

For 5, 7, 9, 10, 10 turns your inscriptions cooldown twice as fast.

At level 5 your command over inscriptions is so good that you can use one more.

value.name: Secrets of the Eternals
value.info_text:
As the only immortal race of Eyal, Shaloren have learnt, over the long years, to use their innate inner magic to protect themselves.

23%, 32%, 39%, 45%, 50% chance to become invisible (power 7, 12, 18, 22, 25) for 5 turns, when hit by a blow doing at least 10% of their total life.

value.name: Timeless
value.info_text:
The world grows old as you stand through the ages. To you, time is different.

Reduces the time remaining on detrimental effects by 4, 7, 8, 10, 11, most cooling down talents by 1, 3, 4, 5, 5, and increases the time remaining on beneficial effects by 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 (up to 2 times the current duration).

value.name: Acid Infusion
value.info_text:
When you throw your alchemist bombs, you infuse them with explosive acid that can blind.

In addition all acid damage you do is increased by 7%, 14%, 20%, 25%, 30%.

value.info_text:

All creatures caught in the mire will also suffer a 13%, 25%, 33%, 40%, 46% slowness effect.

value.name: Dissolving Acid
value.info_text:
Acid errupts all around your target, dealing 220, 299, 359, 411, 456 acid damage.

The acid attack is extremely distracting, and may remove up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 physical or mental temporary effects or mental sustains (depending on the Spell Save of the target).

The damage and chance to remove effects will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Undead Explosion
value.info_text:

Makes the targeted minion explode for 36%, 43%, 47%, 50%, 53% of its maximum life in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 as blight damage.

Beware! Don't get caught in the blast! (unless you know Dark Empthy: 0% chance to ignore damage)

value.name: Assemble
value.info_text:
Combines 3 of your minions into a bone giant.

At level 1, it makes a bone giant.

At level 3, it makes a heavy bone giant.

At level 5, it makes an eternal bone giant.

At level 6, it has a 20% chance to produce a runed bone giant.

Only one bone giant can be active at any time.

value2.info_text:

value.name: Sacrifice
value.info_text:
Sacrifice a bone giant minion. Using its bones, you make a temporary shield around you that prevents any attacks from doing more than 21%, 19%, 17%, 16%, 15% of your total life.

The effect lasts 16, 20, 24, 26, 29 turns.

While supercharged, your golem is enraged and deals 25% more damage.

The beam spins with incredible speed (1600%).

In addition you are able to store 2, 4, 6, 8, 9 more souls.

value.name: Animus Purge
value.info_text:
Try to crush the soul of your foe, doing 227, 308, 371, 424, 471 darkness damage (that can never kill the target).

If the target is left with less than 11%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 28% life you try to take control of its body.

Should this succeed the target becomes your permanent minion (unaffected by your aura) and you regain 2 souls.

Husks prossess the same abilities as they had in life (affected by Dark Empathy), are healed to full when created but can never heal or be healed by any means.

Only one husk can be controlled at any time, if this spell is cast again it will dispell the previous husk, even if no new one is created.

Bosses, other undeads and summoned creatures can not be turned into husks.

The damage and chance will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Essence of the Dead
value.info_text:
Crush and consume two souls to empower your next 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 spells, granting them a special effect.

Affected spells are:

  • Undeath Link: in addition to the heal a shield is created for half the heal power
  • Create Minions: allows you to summon 2 more minions
  • Assemble: allows you to summon a second bone golem
  • Invoke Darkness: becomes a cone of darkness
  • Shadow Tunnel: teleported minions will also be healed for 30% of their max life
  • Cold Flames: freeze chance increased to 100%
  • Ice Shards: each shard becomes a beam
  • Consume Soul: effect increased by 50%

Creates a vortex of arcane energies on the target for 6 turns. Each turn the vortex will look for another foe in sight and fire a manathrust doing 39, 53, 64, 73, 81 arcane damage to all foes in line.

If no foes are found, the target will take 50% more arcane damage.

If the target dies, the vortex explodes, releasing all remaining damage in a radius 2 ball of arcane force.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Phase Door

Teleports you randomly within a small range of up to 13, 15, 16, 18, 18 grids.

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 5, 3, 2, 1, 1). If the target area is not in line of sight, there is a chance the spell will fizzle.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Displacement Shield
value.info_text:
This intricate spell erects a space distortion around the caster that is linked to another distortion, placed around a target.

Any time the caster should take damage, there is a 46%, 53%, 59%, 66%, 72% chance that it will instead be warped by the shield and hit the designated target.

Once the maximum damage (327, 426, 502, 567, 625) is absorbed, the time runs out (13, 17, 21, 25, 25 turns), or the target dies, the shield will crumble.

The max damage the shield can absorb will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Probability Travel
value.info_text:
When you hit a solid surface, this spell tears down the laws of probability to make you instantly appear on the other side.

Teleports up to 15, 19, 23, 26, 28 grids.

After a successful probability travel you are left unstable, unable to do it again for a number of turns equal to 400%, 350%, 300%, 250%, 200% of the number of tiles you blinked through.

The range will improve with your Spellpower.

The effects increase with your Spellpower.

value.info_text:
You learn to finely craft and tune your offensive spells.

You try to carve a hole in spells that affect an area to avoid damaging yourself. The chance of success is 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100%.

In addition, you hone your damaging spells to spellshock their targets. Whenever you deal damage with a spell you attempt to spellshock them with 55, 74, 89, 102, 114 more Spellpower than normal. Spellshocked targets suffer a temporary 20% penalty to damage resistances.

In addition, you hone your damaging spells to spellshock their targets. This talent gives a bonus of 55, 74, 89, 102, 114 to Spellpower solely for the purposes of overcoming the target's Spell Save. Spellshocked targets suffer a temporary 20% penalty to damage resistances.

value.name: Lichform
value.info_text:
This is your true goal and the purpose of all necromancy - to become a powerful and everliving Lich!

If you are killed while this spell is active, the arcane forces you unleash will be able to rebuild your body into the desired Lichform.

All liches gain the following intrinsics:

  • Poison, cut, and fear immunity.
  • 50% disease and stun resistance.
  • 20% cold and darkness resistance.
  • No need to breathe.
  • Infusions do not work.

Also:

  • At level 1: -3 to all stats, -10% to all resistances. Such meagre devotion!
  • At level 2: Nothing.
  • At level 3: +3 Magic and Willpower, +1 life rating (not retroactive).
  • At level 4: +3 Magic and Willpower, +2 life rating (not retroactive), +10 spell and mental saves, Celestial/Star Fury category (0.7) and 0.1 negative energies regeneration.
  • At level 5: +5 Magic and Willpower, +2 life rating (not retroactive), +10 spell and mental saves, all resistance caps raised by 10%, Celestial/Star Fury category (0.9) and 0.5 negative energy regeneration.
  • At level 6: +6 Magic, Willpower and Cunning, +3 life rating (not retroactive), +15 spell and mental saves, all resistance caps raised by 15%, Celestial/Star Fury category (1.1) and 1.0 negative energy regeneration. Fear my power!

The undead cannot use this talent.

While active, it will drain 4 mana per turn.

Once you die and turn into a Lich you can not invest any more in this talent.

The minions level is your level -5, -2, +0, +2, +3.

Ghoul: 19%, 14%, 10%, 7%, 3%

Ghast: 0%, 3%, 5%, 8%, 10%

value.name: Stone Touch
value.info_text:
Touch your foe and turn it to stone for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

Stoned creatures are unable to act or regen life, and are very brittle.

If a stoned creature is hit by an attack that deals more than 30% of its life, it will shatter and be destroyed.

Stoned creatures are highly resistant to fire and lightning, and somewhat resistant to physical attacks.

At level 3 the touch will become a beam.

This spell may fail against creatures resistant to being stunned, that are specifically immune to stoning, or certain bosses.

Lightning emanates from you in a circular wave with radius 3, 4, 4, 5, 6, doing 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 to 114, 155, 186, 213, 236 lightning damage and possibly dazing anyone affected (75% chance).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Shock
value.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of lightning, doing 45, 61, 73, 84, 93 to 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 lightning damage and dazing the target for 3 turns.

If the target resists the daze effect it is instead shocked, which halves stun/daze/pin resistance, for 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.info_text:
Each time one of your lightning spells dazes a target, it has a 36%, 43%, 49%, 56%, 62% chance to creates a chain reaction that summons a mighty Hurricane that lasts for 10 turns around the target with a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3.

Each turn, the afflicted creature and all creatures around it will take 33, 45, 54, 62, 69 to 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 lightning damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

Your Lightning and Chain Lightning spells also gain a 11%, 23%, 35%, 46%, 58% chance to daze, and your Thunderstorm spell gains a 5%, 11%, 17%, 23%, 29% chance to daze.

The duration will increase with your Spellpower.

value.info_text:
A wall of water rushes out from the caster with an initial radius of 1, increasing 1 per turn to a maximum eventual radius of 3, 4, 4, 5, 5, doing 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 cold damage and 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 physical damage to all inside, as well as knocking back targets each turn.

The tidal wave lasts for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

All creatures hit gain the wet effect which reduces their stun/freeze resistance by half of their value and interracts with other cold spells.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Vault
value.info_text:
Use an adjacent friend or foe as a springboard, vaulting over them to another tile within range.

This maneuver grants you a burst of speed from your momentum, allowing you run 63%, 77%, 90%, 101%, 112% faster (movement speed bonus) in the same direction you vaulted for 3 turns.

The increased speed ends if you change directions or stop moving.

value.name: Trained Reactions
value.info_text:
While this talent is sustained, you anticipate deadly attacks against you.

Any time you would lose more than 37%, 30%, 26%, 23%, 21% of your life in a single hit, you instead duck out of the way and assume a defensive posture.

This reduces the triggering damage and all further damage in the same turn by 12%, 20%, 26%, 30%, 33%.

You need 31.2 Stamina and an adjacent open tile to perform this feat (though it does not cause you to move).

value.name: True Grit
value.info_text:
Take a defensive stance to resist the onslaught of your foes.

While wounded, you gain all damage resistance equal to 27%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% of your missing health.

(So if you have lost 70% of your life, you gain 19%, 24%, 28%, 32%, 35% all resistance.)

In addition, your all damage resistance cap increases 19%, 34%, 44%, 51%, 57% closer to 100%.

This consumes stamina rapidly (-12, -9, -7, -5, -4 stamina/turn).

The effects are refreshed at the start of each turn.

value.name: Unstoppable
value.info_text:
You enter a battle frenzy for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns. During that time, you can not use items, healing has no effect, and your health cannot drop below 1.

At the end of the frenzy, you regain 4%, 10%, 14%, 17%, 20% of your health per foe slain during the frenzy.

While Unstoppable is active, Berserker Rage critical bonus is disabled as you lose the thrill of the risk of death.

value.info_text:
Make a melee attack for 100% damage and then attempt to grapple a target up to one size category larger then yourself for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. A grappled opponent will be unable to move, take 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 damage each turn, and 7%, 14%, 20%, 25%, 30% of the damage you receive from any source will be redirected to them. Any movement from the target or you will break the grapple. Maintaining a grapple drains 6 stamina per turn.

You may only grapple a single target at a time, and using any targeted unarmed talent on a target that you're not grappling will break the grapple.

value.name: Blighted Summoning
value.info_text:
You infuse blighted energies into all of your summons, granting them a new talent (at talent level 1):

  • War Hound: Curse of Defenselessness
  • Jelly: Vimsense
  • Minotaur: Life Tap
  • Golem: Bone Spear
  • Alchemy Golems: Corrupted Strength (level 3) and the Reaving Combat tree
  • Ritch: Drain
  • Hydra: Blood Spray
  • Rimebark: Poison Storm
  • Fire Drake: Darkfire
  • Turtle: Curse of Impotence
  • Spider: Corrosive Worm
  • Skeletons: Bone Grab or Bone Spear
  • Bone Giants: Bone Shield
  • Ghouls: Blood Lock
  • Ghoul Rot ghoul: Rend
  • Vampires / Liches: Darkfire
  • Ghosts / Wights: Blood Boil
  • Shadows: Empathic Hex
  • Thought-Forms: Flame of Urh'Rok
  • Treants: Corrosive Worm
  • Yeek Wayists: Dark Portal
  • Bloated Oozes: Bone Shield (level 1)
  • Mucus Oozes: Virulent Disease
  • Temporal Hounds: Elemental Discord

Your necrotic minions and wild-summons get a bonus to Magic equal to yours.

The talent levels increase with your level, and other race- or object-based summons may also be affected.

value.name: Antimagic Shield
value.info_text:
Surround yourself with a shield that will absorb at most 52, 70, 84, 97, 107 non-physical, non-mind element damage per attack.

Each time damage is absorbed by the shield, your equilibrium increases by 1 for every 30 points of damage and a check is made. If the check fails, the shield will crumble and Antimagic Shield will go on cooldown.

The damage the shield can absorb will increase with your Mindpower.

The effect will increase with your Mindpower.

value.name: Ice Claw
value.info_text:
You call upon the mighty claw of a cold drake and rake a wave of freezing cold in front of you, doing 167%, 194%, 215%, 232%, 247% weapon damage as Ice damage in a cone of 1, 1, 2, 3, 3. Ice damage gives a chance of freezing the target.

Every level in Ice Claw additionally raises your Physical, Mental and Spell Saves by 4.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.

value2.name: Ice Claw
value2.info_text:
You call upon the mighty claw of a cold drake, doing 158%, 177%, 191%, 204%, 215% weapon damage as cold damage.

At level 4, the attack becomes pure ice, giving a chance to freeze the target.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.

value.name: Icy Skin
value.info_text:
Your skin forms icy scales and your flesh toughens, increasing your Maximum Life by 2%, 5%, 7%, 10%, 12% and your Armour by 15, 21, 25, 28, 32.

You also deal 29, 35, 41, 45, 49 cold damage to any enemies that physically strike you.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.

The life increase will scale with your Talent Level, and your Armour and retaliation cold damage will scale with Mindpower.

value2.name: Icy Skin
value2.info_text:
Your skin forms icy scales, damaging anyone that hits you for 23, 30, 35, 39, 43 cold damage and increasing your Armour by 20, 25, 30, 34, 37.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.

The damage and Armor will scale with your Willpower.

value.info_text:
Summons an icy wall of 3, 5, 5, 7, 9 length for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. Ice walls are transparent, but block projectiles and enemies.

Ice walls also emit freezing cold, dealing 9.13, 12, 15, 17, 19 damage for each ice wall within radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 of an enemy, and with each wall giving a 25% chance to freeze an enemy. This cold cannot hurt the talent user or their allies.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.
value.name: Ice Wall

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.

You strike your enemy for 160%, 177%, 190%, 201%, 211% weapon damage in one of blinding sand, disarming acid, freezing and slowing ice, dazing lightning or stunning flames, with equal odds.

Additionally, you will cause a burst that deals 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 of that damage to enemies in radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4, regardless of if you hit with the blow.

value.name: Mitosis
value.info_text:
Your body is more like that of an ooze.

When you take damage, you may split and create a Bloated Ooze nearby within your line of sight.

This ooze has as much health as twice the damage you took (up to a maximum of 223, 287, 336, 377, 414, based on your Mindpower and maximum life).

The chance to split equals the percent of your health lost times 1.52, 1.68, 1.77, 1.84, 1.89.

You may have up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 Bloated Oozes active at any time (limited by talent level and the summoning limit), and all damage you take will be split equally between you and them so long as this talent is active.

Bloated Oozes last for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns, are very resilient (16%, 22%, 26%, 30%, 33% all damage resistance to damage not coming through your shared link), and regenerate life quickly.

The chance to split increases with your Cunning.

value2.name: Mitosis
value2.info_text:
Your body is more like that of an ooze.

When you take damage, you may split and create a Bloated Ooze nearby within your line of sight.

This ooze has as much health as twice the damage you took (up to a maximum of 223, 287, 336, 377, 414, based on your Mindpower and maximum life).

The chance to split equals the percent of your health lost times 1.52, 1.68, 1.77, 1.84, 1.89.

You may have up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 Bloated Oozes active at any time (limited by talent level and the summoning limit), and all damage you take will be split equally between you and them so long as this talent is active.

Bloated Oozes last for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns, are very resilient (16%, 22%, 26%, 30%, 33% all damage resistance to damage not coming through your shared link), and regenerate life quickly.

The chance to split increases with your Cunning.

value.name: Reabsorb
value.info_text:
You randomly merge with an adjacent bloated ooze, granting you 40% all damage resistance for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

This process releases a burst of antimagic, dealing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 Manaburn damage in radius 3.

This talent allows you to restore 1.0, 1.3, 1.5, 1.6, 1.8 Equilibrium per turn while Mitosis is active.

The damage, duration and Equilibrium restoration increase with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Reabsorb
value2.info_text:
You randomly merge with an adjacent bloated ooze, granting you 40% all damage resistance for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

This process releases a burst of antimagic, dealing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 Manaburn damage in radius 3.

This talent allows you to restore 1.0, 1.3, 1.5, 1.6, 1.8 Equilibrium per turn while Mitosis is active.

The damage, duration and Equilibrium restoration increase with your Mindpower.

value.name: Call of the Ooze
value.info_text:
Instantly call all of your bloated oozes to your aid.

If you have less than the maximum number of oozes allowed by the Mitosis talent, up to 1 will be created with 38, 46, 51, 55, 57 life (49%, 59%, 65%, 70%, 74% of the maximum life allowed by Mitosis).

Each ooze created will form near a random foe in sight (no more than one ooze per target) and grab its attention.

This will then allow you to channel a melee attack through your ooze to its target, doing 126%, 149%, 167%, 182%, 195% weapon damage (as Acid).

value.name: Mind Parasite
value.info_text:
You use your psiblades to fire a small worm at a foe.

When it hits, it will burrow into the target's brain and stay there for 6 turns, interfering with its ability to use talents.

Each time a talent is used there is 83%, 87%, 89%, 90%, 91% chance that 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 talent(s) are placed on a 4, 8, 11, 13, 14 turn(s) cooldown.

The chance will increase with your Mindpower.

value.name: Swallow
value.info_text:
Attack the target for 205%, 224%, 239%, 251%, 262% Nature weapon damage.

If the attack brings your target below 14%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27% life or kills it, you can try to swallow it, killing it automatically and regaining life and equilibrium depending on its level.

The chance to swallow depends on your talent level and the relative size of the target.

Levels in Swallow additionally raises your Physical and Mental critical rate by 2%, 5%, 8%, 10%, 12%, passively.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.

value2.name: Swallow
value2.info_text:

If the attack brings your target below 14%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27% life or kills it, you can try to swallow it, killing it automatically and regaining life and equilibrium depending on its level.

The chance to swallow depends on your talent level and the relative size of the target.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.

value.name: Quake
value.info_text:
You slam the ground, shaking the area around you in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

Creatures caught by the quake will be damaged for 170%, 187%, 200%, 211%, 221% weapon damage, and knocked back up to 3 tiles away.

The terrain will also be moved around within the radius, and the user will be shifted to a random square within the radius.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.

value2.name: Quake
value2.info_text:
You slam your foot onto the ground, shaking the area around you in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

Creatures caught by the quake will be damaged for 3, 8, 17, 27, 36 and knocked back up to 4 tiles away.

The terrain will also be moved around within the quake's radius.

The damage will increase with your Strength.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.

value.info_text:
Allows you to burrow into earthen walls for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Your powerful digging abilities also allow you to exploit and smash through enemy defensive weaknesses; You ignore 28, 35, 40, 45, 48 of target armor and 14%, 17%, 20%, 22%, 24% of enemy physical damage resistance while this is in effect.

At Talent Level 5, this talent can be used instantly, and the cooldown will reduce with levels.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate.

value.name: Lightning Speed
value.info_text:
You transform into pure lightning, moving 495%, 595%, 682%, 761%, 836% faster for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 game turns.

Also provides 30% physical damage resistance and 100% lightning resistance.

Any actions other than moving will stop this effect.

Note: since you will be moving very fast, game turns will pass very slowly.

Levels in Lightning Speed additionally raises your Movement Speed by 11%, 22%, 32%, 41%, 49%, passively.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.

value2.name: Lightning Speed
value2.info_text:
You transform into pure lightning, moving 495%, 595%, 682%, 761%, 836% faster for 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 game turns.

Also provides 30% physical damage resistance and 100% lightning resistance.

Any actions other than moving will stop this effect.

Note: since you will be moving very fast, game turns will pass very slowly.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.

value.name: Static Field
value.info_text:
Generate an electrical field around you in a radius of 1, 3, 4, 6, 7. Any creature caught inside will lose up to 29%, 36%, 40%, 43%, 45% of its current life (20%, 24%, 27%, 29%, 30% if the target is Elite or Rare, 15%, 18%, 20%, 21%, 23% if the target is a Unique or Boss, and 12%, 14%, 16%, 17%, 18% if they are an Elite Boss.). This life drain is irresistable, but can be saved against with physical save.

Additionally, it will deal 107, 145, 175, 200, 222 lightning damage afterwards, regardless of target rank.

Current life loss and lightning damage will increase with your Mindpower, and the lightning damage element can critically hit with mental critical chances.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.

value2.name: Static Field
value2.info_text:
Generate an electrical field around you in a radius of 1. Any creature caught inside will lose up to 29%, 36%, 40%, 43%, 45% of its current life (effect decreased for higher creature ranks).

This effect cannot kill creatures. Life loss will increase with your Mindpower.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.

value.name: Tornado
value.info_text:
Summons a tornado that moves slowly toward its target, following it if it changes position.

Any foe caught in its path takes 73, 98, 118, 135, 150 lightning damage.

When it reaches its target, it explodes in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 for 128, 174, 209, 239, 265 lightning damage and 128, 174, 209, 239, 265 physical damage. All affected creatures will be knocked back, and the targeted creature will be stunned for 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns. The blast will ignore the talent user.

The tornado will last for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns, or until it reaches its target.

Damage will increase with your Mindpower, and the stun chance is based on your Mindpower vs target Physical Save.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.

value2.info_text:

Any foe caught in its path takes 73, 98, 118, 135, 150 lightning damage.

When it reaches its target, it explodes in a radius of 1 for 128, 174, 209, 239, 265 lightning damage and 128, 174, 209, 239, 265 physical damage. All affected creatures will be knocked back, and the targeted creature will be stunned for 4 turns.

The tornado will last for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, or until it reaches its target.

Damage will increase with your Mindpower.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate. The Daze chance is based on your Mindpower.

value.info_text:
Destroys one of your summons, making it detonate in radius of 4, 5, 6, 7, 8.

  • Ritch Flamespitter: Explodes into a fireball
  • Hydra: Explodes into a ball of lightning, acid or poison
  • Rimebark: Explodes into an iceball
  • Fire Drake: Generates a cloud of fire
  • War Hound: Explodes into a ball of physical damage
  • Jelly: Explodes into a ball of slowing slime
  • Minotaur: Explodes into a sharp ball, cutting all creatures
  • Stone Golem: Knocks back all creatures
  • Turtle: Grants a small shell shield to all friendly creatures
  • Spider: Pins all foes around

    Hostile effects will not hit you or your other summons.

    The effects improve with your Willpower.

value.info_text:
Spray forth a glob of acidic moisture at your enemy.

The target will take 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 Mindpower-based acid damage.

Enemies struck have a 25% chance to be Disarmed for three turns, as their weapon is rendered useless by an acid coating.

At Talent Level 5, this becomes a piercing line of acid.

Every level in Acidic Spray additionally raises your Mindpower by 4, passively.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.

value.name: Corrosive Mist
value.info_text:
Exhale a mist of lingering acid, dealing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 acid damage that can critical in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 each turn for 6, 6, 7, 7, 7 turns.

Enemies in this mist will be corroded for 2, 3, 3, 3, 4 turns, lowering their Accuracy, their Armour and their Defense by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25.

The damage and duration will increase with your Mindpower, and the radius will increase with talent level.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.

value.name: Dissolve
value.info_text:
You strike the enemy with a rain of fast, acidic blows. You strike four times for pure acid damage. Every blow does 35%, 46%, 54%, 60%, 67% damage.

Every two talent levels, one of your strikes becomes blinding acid instead of normal acid, blinding the target 25% of the time if it hits.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.

value.name: Corrosive Breath
value.info_text:
You breathe acid in a frontal cone of radius 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 176, 229, 268, 301, 329 acid damage.

Enemies caught in the acid have a 38%, 45%, 50%, 55%, 58% chance of their weapons becoming useless for three turns.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate. The Disarm chance is based on your Mindpower.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.
